Para Yesenia lo más importante es su familia y hace todo lo que este a su alcance para llevar el sustento diario. Ella se dedica a la elaboración de pan desde hace mucho tiempo. De esta forma se gana la vida y lleva el sustento a su hogar.  La vivienda donde habita es propia pero por falta de recursos económicos no ha podido hacer los trámites para escrituración de la vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para proceder lo antes posible y así poder contar con el documento que le ampare la tenencia de la vivienda.
texts.en:
Yesenia is 35 years old and lives with her husband and her small two-year-old son.  For Yesenia, her family is most important and she does everything she can to support them.  She has made a living for a long time by making bread.  This is how she earns a living and supports her household.

The house where she lives is her own but because she lacks financial resources she has not been able to apply for the deed to the house.  This is why she asks for a loan from FUSAI to proceed as soon as possible and thus be able to have the document that protects the occupancy of the house.

loans.use: to invest in the process of getting a deed for her house.

loans.name: Estela

texts.es: Estela, habita en un barrio marginal de Managua, junto a su esposo e hija, Estela Labora para una fábrica de galletas como ayudante de proceso o empacadora de productos, ella continua construyendo por partes su humilde vivienda ya que es una familia de escasos recursos que no pueden hacer estas inversiones de un solo gasto, por eso acuden a solicitar apoyo de crédito para comprar materiales de construcción para mejorar sus condiciones de vida, en esta ocasión empezara la construcción de porche para obtener un poco más de espacio en su hogar y prestar las condiciones cuando tenga sus nietos.
texts.en:
Estela lives in a neighborhood outside Managua with her husband and daughter. She works as a manufacturing and packaging assistant for a cookie factory. 

She is still building her humble home piece by piece. Since her family has limited resources, they cannot make the entire investment all at once. Therefore, they have applied for a loan to buy construction materials to improve their living conditions. On this occasion, she will start construction on a porch to have a bit more space in her home and to provide a place for her grandchildren when they come.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, iron, blocks, beams, and zinc sheets.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es: Margarita de 49 años de edad es madre soltera y se dedica a la compra y venta de productos lácteos. Margarita ha visto la oportunidad para aumentar sus ingresos por lo que ha solicitado un préstamo a FUSAI y con el dinero desea comprar una hielera más grande y mandar a construir un carretón para vender además de los lácteos, refrescos de distintos sabores. Ella está muy entusiasmada con poder conseguir su objetivo.
texts.en:
Margarita, 49, is a single mother.  She makes a living buying and selling dairy products.

Margarita has the opportunity to increase her income, so she has asked FUSAI for a loan.  With the money she wants to buy a larger cooler as well as have a cart built for selling the dairy products and beverages of different flavors.

She's very excited about being able to achieve her goal.

loans.use: to buy a cooler and to build a food cart

loans.name: Eliu De Jesus

texts.es: Don Eliu de Jesús es originario de la ciudad de León. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de comida rápida. Se siente agradecido con KIVA y MiCrédito ya que ha logrado establecer su propio negocio el cual le ha ayudado a obtener mejores ingresos. Solicita el crédito para comprar: Pan, Lechuga, Carne, Tomate, Salsa de tomate entre otros productos para la elaboración de las Hamburguesas. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá ampliar su negocio, cumplir con las demandas de sus clientes, y así tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Eliu de Jesús is originally from the city of León. He is a business owner working in fast food sales. He feels grateful for Kiva and MiCrédito since he has already managed to establish his own business that has helped him earn more income. He requests this loan to buy: bread, lettuce, meat, tomatoes, tomato sauce, among other products for making hamburgers. Eliu thinks this loan will be very helpful, since he will be able to grow his business, meet the needs of his customers, and that way have better earnings.

loans.use: to buy bread, lettuce, meat, tomatoes, tomato sauce, among other items to make hamburgers.

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 25-year-old Mohamed from Waterloo, the western rural area in Freetown. He is married with two children between the ages of 1 year and 3 years.  He was a student, he began this business to create a permanent source of income.

Mohamed runs a building material business within a busy market area. He has been running this business since 2009. Mohamed works at the business from 7:00 am until 6:00 pm, 6 days per week.  Mohemed says that the main challenge to his business is slow purchasing power during rainy season.

Mohamed has requested a loan in order to purchase cement, zinc, nails and paint for resale. The extra income from this loan will allow him to increase his business and take care of his family welfare. In the future, he plans to become a distributor. He thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to purchase cement, zinc, and nails and paint for resale

loans.name: Rafic

texts.en:
Rafic is a 44-year-old Lebanese married man living with his wife and two children, one of them working. In 2010, and after gaining 15 years of experience working in grocery stores, he opened his own shop where he started to sell detergents, dairy products, canned food, sweets, etc. 

Rafic is currently requesting to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. in order to continue strengthening his business by buying goods such as sweets, soft drinks, and juices. This will allow him to offer a greater variety of products, meet various tastes, and improve sales and the family's income.

loans.use: to buy goods such as sweets, soft drinks, and juices

loans.name: Rene Miguel

texts.es: Miguel es un joven entusiasta trabajador  que vive en la comunidad del sardinal con sus padres y hermanos , el comenta que con sacrificio de sus padres logro estudiar hasta primer año de secundaria, ya después no continuo con los estudios pues le quedaba bastante lejos la escuela ademas debía ayudarle a su padre en los labores del campo trabajando la tierra, con cultivo de café y granos básicos , de ahí es la fuente de ingreso que tiene el y su familia para subsistir,aparte dice el se dedica a la compra , venta y reparación de motocicletas usadas lo hace como un pasatiempo ademas es otra fuente de ingreso . En la casa de sus padres nos comenta ya tienen un pequeño sistema solar pero quiere ampliarlo para tener mas luminarias en toda la casa ademas poder usar la plancha , radio y cargar los celulares, es por eso que realiza el tramita de crédito para comprar un modulo solar para su hogar y así mejorar la condición de vida de sus padres y sus hermanos
texts.en:
Miguel is a young, enthusiastic worker who lives in the community of Sardinal with his parents and siblings. He says that with his parents' sacrifice, he managed to study up until the first year of secondary school. Afterwards, he did not continue studying because the school was very far away and he felt that he should help his father with the farm labor by working the fields with coffee crops and basic grains. This is the source of income for him and his family to survive. He says that he also buys, sells and repairs used motorcycles. This is a hobby for him as well as an additional source of income. 

In his parents' home, there is already a small solar power system. They would like to expand this to have lights in the entire house, as well as to be able to use the iron, radio and charge cell phones. Therefore, he has applied for a loan to buy a solar module for his home to improve the quality of life for his parents and siblings.

loans.use: to buy a solar panel for his home.

loans.name: United Group

texts.en:
The United group is made up of three members who are involved in diverse business activities. The members are happy in finding themselves in their sixth loan cycle. They are part of the larger group called Universal.

Jennifer is thirty-two-years-old and sells soft drinks. She is married to Francis, a forty-two-year-old civil servant. For seven years, she has been dedicated to selling soft drinks and provisions at her residence. Through this work she has been able to provide her children with the help of her husband better education and good food.

She will invest the loan in the purchase of soft drinks. Her greatest dream is to have a stall where she can operate and expand more.

The group is thankful to the Kiva investors for helping them to improve the economic standing of their families. The whole group needs an amount of GHS 1,900 to expand.

loans.use: To buy more and sell to customers

loans.name: Marcos

texts.es: Marcos, tiene la edad  de 35 años, está casado, vive con sus hijos y esposa los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de herramientas y equipo para la construcción de viviendas o lugares comerciales, las cuales le facilitará la elaboración de los trabajos y así poder mejorar la calidad de los diseños y tipos de acabados y aprovechar el conocimiento adquirido  mediante la práctica de varios años y  así poder tener ingresos económicos para seguir invirtiendo en la compra de herramientas  y otros equipos, y  seguir brindando cada día un mejor servicio, además de aumentar la oferta en trabajos y calidad. Con esta compra pretende hacer más construcciones y con diseños más actualizados y con mayor variedad y así cumplir con los pedidos a un plazo más adecuado. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Marcos is 35 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children who are his top priority. With his loan he plans to buy tools and equipment for constructing homes and commercial properties, which will facilitate completion of these jobs. Marcos will be able to improve the quality of designs and types of finishes, to take advantage of knowledge gained during years on the job, and as such be able to have more income to continue investing in the purchase of tools and other equipment. He can continue offering better service every day, as well as increase the amount and quality of business. With this purchase he plans to do more construction, and with updated plans and better variety he can fulfill orders within a better time frame. This is the first loan Marco has received from FUDECOSUR. He has never had any state bank loans before, but FUDECOSUR has offered him the loan with the most facilities and the lowest interest rate.

loans.use: to buy tools.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El Sr. Juan tiene 68 años, está casado hace 47 años con la Sra. Julia de 63 años, juntos tuvieron 7 hijos, los cuales con mucho sacrificio han podido criarlos y darles todo lo que necesitaban para una vida digna.
Juan tiene su negocio de despensa y verdulería ubicada dentro de un mercado desde el año 1997,empezó con un capital que pudo juntar gracias a una buena producción agrícola que tuvo porque el señor además se dedica a la agricultura, realiza repartos por los negocios de los barrios y la señora atiende el negocio del mercado.
Él solicita el préstamo para la compra de frutas y verduras en general,  maíz, arroz, fideos, aceite de este modo poder surtir su negocio y dar a sus clientes una mayor variedad y calidad de productos.
texts.en:
Juan, 68, has been married to Julia, 63, for 47 years. They have seven children together. With plenty of sacrifice, they raised their children and gave them everything they needed for a decent life.

Juan has had a small grocery and vegetable stand in a market since 1997. He started with a small amount of capital which he saved thanks to a good agricultural season. He also works in agriculture and makes deliveries to businesses in other neighborhoods while his wife takes care of the market stand.

He has applied for a loan to buy fruit and vegetables, corn, rice, beans, and oil. He will then be able to stock his business and give his clients a greater variety and quality of products.

loans.use: to buy corn, rice, beans, oil, etc.

loans.name: Awatef

texts.en:
Awatef is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in the photo.
Awatef is a 43-year-old married woman from Rafah city. She is a mother for six kids; four sons and two daughters. Awatef works as an employee in the public sector with a very low income. This income is barely able to cover all the family needs. Awatef decided to buy a small rickshaw for her son to work on it in transferring goods for the local traders, it helps the family for part of their expenses. 
Awatef took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy a new rickshaw for her son to transfer goods for the local traders. By taking this loan, Awatef's son will be able to improve his business and also his income.

loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw for her son to transfer goods for the local traders

loans.name: Hasan

texts.en:
Hasan is a 26-year-old Lebanese single man. Four years ago, he started to work as a private teacher, receiving students at his house, where he provides them with the needed education. He works in parallel at installing specific programs on computers, which he has done since 2011. Hasan is forced to work simultaneously in two jobs as he really requires earning a good income to support his family money-wise. And today, with his youth loan requested from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l., he will purchase books and educational objects that will definitely ease his teaching work. 

Hasan is very positive about his future, and he is doing a great effort at this moment in time to improve his teaching room and acquire additional supplies to be able to receive more students in the next coming school season.

loans.use: to purchase books and educational objects

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es:
La señora María Isabel de 54  años de edad, vive con su esposo, no  tiene  hijos  que dependen de ella, vive en la comunidad de San Lorenzo, valle al sur de Honduras.
Doña  María Isabel tiene casa propia  y se dedica desde hace 07 años  a la venta de tortilla, sus clientes le prefieren por su buen trato y también que ella atiende  a sus clientes en las dos jornadas.
Doña María es una mujer trabajadora y con deseos de salir adelante, está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de maíz, leña y cal, con el apoyo del préstamo suplirá su necesidad de financiamiento.
Doña María está muy contenta de seguir trabajando con Prisma, su sueño es mejorar su casa y tener otro negocio que le genere ingresos.

 San Lorenzo, Honduras- Diciembre del 2013.
texts.en:
María Isabel, 54, lives with her husband and has no dependent children. She lives in the community of San Lorenzo, a valley in the south of Honduras. María Isabel has her own home and has been selling tortillas for 7 years. Her clients prefer her business due to her good service and the fact that she serves clients on two working days. 

María is a hardworking woman with a desire to succeed. She is applying for a loan to buy corn, firewood and lime. With the support of this loan, she will cover her financial needs. 

María is very happy to continue working with Prisma. Her dream is to make improvements to her house and to have another business to earn more income.

loans.use: to buy corn, firewood and lime for her business.

loans.name: Hajah

texts.en: Hajah lives in Barnesville, one of the populated areas in Montserrado County. She is 39 years old and married with two children, ages 1 and 6 years old. Her older child is attending school, and they all live at home. For the past five years now, she has been operating a shop where she sells plastic chairs, tubs, buckets, baskets, etc. She started this business with $40 USD, and she learned this way of selling from her friends. A challenge she faces is the transportation cost. She is requesting a loan to purchase more plastic chairs, tubs, buckets, baskets, etc., for her business. Her plans are to expand her business and educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more plastic chairs, tubs, buckets, baskets, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Kimsan's Group

texts.en:
Kimsan is 51 years old and a married father blessed with three kids. To strive for a living, he grows cassava and plants soy beans. This is the business that he has had for 9 years and it returns him currently about 28,700 KHR per day. This is the first microloan for Kimsan with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). 

He is now forming a group of two to get a new loan. As the leader, he will spend his entire loan portion to buy a hand tractor to grind his cassava as well as to plow his farmland. He hopes that he can gain a good income from his crop.

loans.use: To buy a hand tractor to grind his cassava as well as to plow his farmland.

loans.name: Adama

texts.en:
Meet 33-year-old Adama from Waterloo, western rural area, in Freetown in Sierra Leone. She is married with three children. In 2003, Adama established her retail business. She began her business because she wanted to contribute to taking care of her children. She works at the business from 8:00 a.m. until 5:30 p.m., six days per week. She says that the main challenge to her business is price inflation and a proper business location.

Adama requires a loan in order to purchase cigarettes, drinks and soap to expand her business. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her to change her status of living and increase her business. In the future, Adama plans to open a big provisions store. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase cigarettes, drinks and soap to expand her business.

loans.name: Issa

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 37-year-old Issa from Waterloo, the western rural area in Freetown. He is married with two children between the ages of 4 years and 8 years. One of his children is attending school. He was a shop keeper, he started his business to change his status of living.

Issa runs a building material shop within a busy market area. He has been running this business for 15 years. He works at the business from 7:00 am until 6:00 pm, six days per week.  Issa says that the main challenge to his business is transporting his goods from town to Waterloo.

Issa has requested a loan in order to purchase cement, zinc, nails and a locker door. The extra income from this loan will allow him to open a savings account and take care of his family's welfare. In the future, he plans to become a wholesaler. He thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to purchase cement, zinc, nails and a locker door

loans.name: Milutin

texts.en:
Milutin is 46 years old and married with two children. He is living in one of the minority communities in Kosovo with his wife and their children, who are 14 and 18 years old; both children are attending school. Based on tradition, he has been working in a locksmith shop, which he started working at when he was very young. He recognized that this type of business is profitable, and has been staying in the field all of these years. He serves all of the people in the community regardless of ethnicity or nationality. 

Because he has been working for a long time, his tools have become old, broken and outdated, so he is requesting a loan to purchase new tools for his work. The loan will help him to increase his income as the new tools will help him to be more efficient and effective, and he is hoping in the near future to expand his business so that he can add more income and offer his children a better education. He appreciates this help and wants to thank all of the lenders!

loans.use: To purchase new tools for his locksmith work

loans.name: Dúo Huerto Del Eden Group

texts.es:
DUO HUERTO DEL EDEN
Doña Aura Roselia es originaria de Tecpan, tiene 27 años de edad bajo su responsabilidad están sus dos hijos menores de edad que necesitan el cuidado de ella, ella se dedica  a la venta de ropa en el mercado municipal de Tecpan.
Ella ha empezado esta actividad desde hace algún tiempo, gracias a Dios ha mejorado y ha podido salir adelante.
Gracias al apoyo de su esposo ella sigue adelante con su negocio el trabaja como jornalero en una gasolinera y con el sueldo de el ayuda a su esposa.
Ella sueña con ampliar su negocio, tener más variedad de productos que ofrecer a sus clientes ya que así tendrá mejores ganancias y mandar a sus hijos a la escuela esta solicitando este credito para la compra de ropa nueva para la venta.
texts.en: DUO HUERTO DEL EDEN (Garden of Eden Duo): Aura Roselia is from Tecpan. She is 27 years old, and among her responsibilities are two young children who need her care. She works in the sale of clothing in the city market of Tecpan. She started this business a short while ago, thanks to God it has improved and she has been able to expand. Thanks to the support of her husband Aura Roselia continues on with her business. He works as a day laborer in a gas station and his wages help his wife. Aura Roselia dreams of growing her business and having more variety of products to offer her customers, since then she will have greater earnings and send her children to school. She is requesting this loan to buy new clothing to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: Elmira

texts.ru: Эльмире 34 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 4 детей. У Эльмиры -высшее образование, работает учителем в местной школе, в качестве дополнительного дохода для своей семьи Эльмира занимается животноводством, стартовав 9 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Эльмиры, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 14 овец. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Эльмира обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Эльмира планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en: Elmira is 34 years old, married and raising 4 children with her husband. Elmira has a higher education and works as a teacher at a local school. To provide an additional income for her family, she is involved in animal husbandry, having started 9 years ago with a purchase of livestock with 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Elmira's hard work, today her business contains 2 dairy cows and 14 sheep. The monthly income amounts to 10,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, Elmira requested a loan from the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" to buy sheep in order to increase livestock headcount. Elmira plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further increasing domestic livestock quantities and saving money for her children's continued education.

loans.use: to buy sheep in order to increase livestock headcount

loans.name: Bubinazira

texts.ru: Бубиназире 47 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 5 детей. Старший сын находится на заработках в России, дочь замужем, остальные дети на иждивении родителей. У Бубиназиры - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Бубиназира занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 20 лет назад, с покупки скота на 3,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Бубиназиры, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 3 дойные коровы, а также имеет земельный надел размером 1,3 ГА, на которой выращивает: хлопок, кукурузу, клевер и картошку. В хозяйстве также помогают дети школьного возраста. Супруг занимается транспортировкой груза на собственной автомашине, имеет определенный доход. Ежемесячный совокупный доход составляет 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Бубиназира обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку бычков для откорма. Доходы от кредита Бубиназира планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и намерена собрать средства на проведение свадебного торжества для сына.
texts.en: Bubinazira is 47 years old, married and raising 5 children with her husband. Her oldest son is working in Russia, daughter is married, and the rest of the children are being supported by the parents.  Bubinazira has a secondary education. To provide the primary income for her family, she is involved in animal husbandry and farming, having started 20 years ago with a purchase of livestock with 3,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Bubinazira's hard work, today her business contains 3 dairy cows and a 1.3 hectare land plot, where she grows cotton, corn, clover and potatoes. Her school-age children also help her with the business.  Her husband is involved in transporting heavy loads with his own car and has a set income.  The aggregate monthly income amounts to 15,000 som (KGS). In order to further develop her business, Bubinazira requested a loan from the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" to buy bulls for fattening up. Bubinazira plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further increasing domestic livestock quantities and saving money to hold a wedding party for her son.

loans.use: to buy bulls for fattening up

loans.name: Rwentuha Development Association Group

texts.en:
Peace is a member of Rwentuha Development group and is a mother of two children who are aged four and two. 

She has a drug shop, and she works 12 hours per day. She started the business in 2009 and has carried it on to date for the purpose of getting income to support her family, which was the main reason why she started the business. In addition to the drug shop business, Peace also sells shoes, so as to boost her income so that she can have enough money to cater to the needs of her children. Her customers are people in her area of operation, and she hopes to buy more drugs for sale using the loan money. Lack of enough capital is her main challenge, but she believes that this will be no more if she gets the loan.

She is hopeful that if she continues to be the hardworking person she has always been, her business will grow, she will get enough money from the business, and she will be in a position to give a decent education to her growing children.

loans.use: To buy drugs to sell in her pharmacy

loans.name: Lesbia

texts.es:
La señora Lesbia de 23 años de edad, es madre soltera,  tiene un  hijo  que depende de ella, vive en una comunidad de San Lorenzo, valle al sur de Honduras.
Doña Lesbia no tiene casa propia y vive en casa de una hermana, se dedica desde hace 02 años a la venta de ropa usada de forma ambulante,  sus clientes le prefieren por su buen trato y sus precios sus muy buenos.
 Doña Lesbia es una mujer que lucha día con día para sacar adelante a su hijo, es un cliente que es ejemplo de trabajo y estudio ya que estudia en la universidad.
Doña Lesbia está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de ropa como blusas, vestidos, faldas, pantalones, camisas, etc. para ambos sexos ya que tiene varios pedidos de ropa nueva clasificada, con el apoyo del préstamo espera suplir la necesidad de financiamiento, es un cliente que solicita por primera vez un préstamo a Prisma.
Doña Lesbia su sueño es mejorar su negocio.

 San Lorenzo, Honduras - Diciembre del 2013
texts.en:
Lesbia is 23 years old and is a single mother with a dependent son. She lives in a community in San Lorenzo, a valley in the south of Honduras. Lesbia does not have her own house and lives at a sister's house. For 2 years she has been selling used clothing as a street vendor and is popular with her customers because of her good service and very good prices. Lesbia is someone who works hard every day so she can bring up her son. As a client she is exemplary in her work and study, as she is studying at university.

Lesbia is asking for the loan to buy blouses, dresses, skirts, trousers, shirts etc. for men and women since she has several new orders for used clothing. With the help of the loan she hopes to have the capital she needs. This is the first time she has asked for a loan from Prisma. Lesbia's dream is to improve her business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - December 2013

loans.use: to buy blouses, dresses, skirts, trousers, shirts etc. for her business.

loans.name: Mwanakombo

texts.en:
Mwanakombo appreciates her previous Kiva loan that improved her living standards and enabled her to expand her business and earn a higher income. 

Apart from the dumplings and peas selling business, Mwanakombo operates a cashew nut selling business. She is requesting a loan of 30,000 Kenya Shillings (KES) to purchase sacks of cashew nuts and use the rest for transportation costs. 

She thanks Yehu for their financial support.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of cashew nuts and to use the rest for transportation costs.

loans.name: Nasalino

texts.es:
El Señor Nasalino  tiene 41 años, vive en pareja desde hace 16 años con el señora Julia, con quien tiene tres hijos. Sus hijos son su razón de lucha y el por qué se están esforzando por salir adelante.
El Sr. Nasalino se dedica hace 7 años  a la compra y venta de mandioca (una raíz típica que se come en el Paraguay). Se inició con un capital inicial que consiguió de su trabajo anterior, empezó a incursionar en este negocio y actualmente tiene formada su clientela y le surte a los negocios de los barrios de esta ciudad, trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas, además le da fuente de trabajo a 4 personas que le está ayudando diariamente a poder realizar sus ventas.
Solicita este préstamo para la compra de mandioca para la venta y también realizar el mantenimiento del vehículo que usa para el reparto de sus productos.
texts.en:
Nasalino  is 41 years old and for 16 years has lived with his partner Julia, with whom he has three children. Their children are their main focus in life and the reason why they are working hard to make progress. 

For the last 7years Nasalino has made a living buying and selling cassava (a typical root which is eaten in Paraguay). He began with initial capital which he made from his previous job and started out in the business. Now he has an established clientele and supplies businesses in areas around the city. He works every day from very early in the morning. Nasalino also provides employment for 4 people who help him with his sales on a daily basis.

Nasalino is asking for the loan to buy cassava to sell and also to carry out repairs on his vehicle which he uses to distribute his produce.

loans.use: to buy cassava and also carry out maintenance on his vehicle.

loans.name: Ruziboy

texts.ru: Рузибой житель города Конибодом. Ему 52 года. Он активно занимается животноводством. Рузибою помогает в его деятельности жена. Это их семейный бизнес. Вот уже 15 лет как Рузибой занимается выращиванием мелкорогатого скота. У него имеется скотный двор, где он держит овец. Одновременно Рузибой со своей семьей занимается растениеводством. Сейчас он просит кредит для развития бизнеса овцеводства. У него во дворе осталось пару овец и поэтому он хочет увеличить поголовье овец. На сумму кредита Рузибой планирует купить трех овец. Он надеется на поддержку.
texts.en: Ruziboy is a 52-year-old resident of Konibodom.  He is a sheep farmer by trade, and is helped by his wife as well; it's the family business, and they've been at it for the past 15 years.  They have a pen where they keep their sheep, and, apart from raising sheep, Ruziboy and his family also grow crops.  At the moment, he is seeking a loan to add more sheep to his farm.  He only has 2 sheep left, and would like to buy 3 more.  He is counting on your support.

loans.use: buy 3 sheep to help grow his livestock-raising business

loans.name: Djiguiya Group

texts.fr:
DJIGUIYA est un groupe de l’association MARIAMTON de KELEYA. Il regroupe 4 femmes qui se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et de voisinage. Elles ont une moyenne d’âge de 50 ans. Mariées avec en moyenne six enfants, elles mènent différentes activités  telles l’achat vente de condiments  et de la restauration. Elles vivent dans des grandes familles traditionnelles à KELEYA dans la  préfecture de BOUGOUNI (Région de SIKASSO, République du Mali). 
Elles sont dans le petit commerce depuis plusieurs années et sont très sollicitées dans leurs activités. 
Dans le souci de satisfaire le besoin croissant de leur clientèle, les membres du groupe ont décidé d’intégrer le programme crédit de Soro Yiriwaso il y a six ans. Elles sont à leur cinquième prêt solidaire. 
MAIMOUNA, qui est la deuxième personne de la gauche vers la droite compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 10 sacs de mil et de condiments alimentaires.  Elle s’approvisionne à KELEYA et environnants  et vend ses galettes et condiments à KELEYA, en détail, au comptant et à crédit, à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes.   
Elle espère sur un bénéfice mensuel de 30.000FCFA somme qui lui  permettra de rembourser le prêt et de réinvestir dans son activité.
texts.en: Djiguiya is a group from the Mariamton association of Keleya. It brings together 4 women who know one another through parentage and neighborly ties. They are 50 years old on average. Married with an average of six children, they run different businesses, such as buying and selling vegetables to make sauces and restaurants. They live in large traditional families in Keleya in the Bougouni prefecture (Sikasso prefecture, Republic of Mali). They have run small businesses for several years and are very sought after in their businesses. With the concern of satisfying the growing needs of their clientele, the members of the group decided to join the loan program of Soro Yiriwaso six years ago. They are on the fifth group loan. Maimouna, who is the second person from the left to the right, expects to use her loan to buy 10 bags of millet and vegetables for making sauces. She stocks up in Keleya and the surrounding area and sells her pancakes and vegetable for making sauces in Keleya at retail for cash and for credit, to a clientele made up of men and women. She hopes for a monthly profit of 30,000 f CFA, a sum which will allow her to pay back the loan and to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to purchase millet and vegetables for making sauces.

loans.name: Papa

texts.fr: Papa est un maraîcher âgé de 54 il est établi dans le village de Ronkh, marié et père de 9 enfants, il a commencé cette activité de maraîchage depuis qu'il est petit avec ses parents.Avec ce crédit, il achètera du semence de gombo, de tomate, d'aubergine violette et de l'herbicide.
texts.en:
Papa, age 54, is a farmer who lives in a village called Ronkh. He's married and the father of nine children. He started growing vegetables with his parents during his childhood.

With this loan, Papa will buy okra, tomato and purple eggplant seeds, as well as herbicide.

loans.use: buy okra, tomato and purple eggplant seeds, as well as herbicide

loans.name: Médoune

texts.fr: Médoune est un cultivateur établi dans le village de Ronkh,âgé de 49 ans, il est marié et père de 3 enfants.Il a commencé cette activité de maraîchage depuis qu'il est tout petit avec ses parents, avec ce crédit, il achètera du semence d'aubergine locale, de gombo, de piment et de l'herbicide.
texts.en:
Médoune is a 49-year-old farmer who lives in the village of Ronkh. He is married with three children. He was introduced to market gardening at a young age alongside his parents. 

He plans to use this loan to buy seeds to grow local eggplant, okra and peppers. He will also buy herbicides.

loans.use: to buy seeds to grow local eggplant, okra and peppers, and to buy herbicide.

loans.name: Mademba

texts.fr: Mademba est cultivateur âgé de 51 ans, établi dans le village de Ronkh, il est marié et père de 7 enfants; il a commencé à exercer cette activité de maraîchage depuis qu'il est tout petit avec ses parents.Avec ce crédit, il achètera du semence de tomate, de chou et de l'herbicide.
texts.en:
Mademba is a 51-year-old farmer who lives in the village of Ronkh. He is married with seven children. He was introduced to market gardening at a young age alongside his parents. 

Mademba plans to use this loan to buy seeds to grow tomatoes and cabbage. He will also buy herbicides.

loans.use: to buy seeds to grow tomatoes and cabbage, and to buy herbicides as well.

loans.name: Cheikh

texts.fr: Cheikh est un cultivateur âgé de 53 ans établi dans le village de Ronkh, il est marié et père de 9 enfants, il a commencé cette activité de maraîchage depuis qu'il petit avec ses parents.Avec ce crédit acquis, il achètera du semence de gombo, de piment, de banane, d'aubergine locale, d'aubergine violette et de l'herbicide.
texts.en:
Cheikh is a 53-year-old farmer who lives in the village of Ronkh. He is married with nine children. He was introduced to market gardening at a young age alongside his parents. 

Cheikh plans to use this loan to buy seeds to grow okra, peppers, bananas, and eggplant (local and purple varieties). He will also buy herbicides.

loans.use: to buy seeds to grow okra, peppers, bananas, and eggplant (local and purple varieties), and to buy herbicides.

loans.name: Brahim

texts.fr: Brahim est un cultivateur âgé de 40 ans établi dans le village de Ronkh, il est marié et père de 10 enfants.Il a commencé cette activité de maraîchage depuis qu'il est tout petit avec ses parents.Avec ce crédit, il achètera du semence de gombo, d'aubergine locale, d'aubergine violette, de piment et d'herbicide.
texts.en:
Brahim is a 40-year-old farmer who lives in the village of Ronkh. He is married with ten children. He was introduced to market gardening at a young age alongside his parents. 

Brahim plans to use this loan to buy seeds to grow okra, peppers, and eggplant (local and purple varieties). He will also buy herbicides.

loans.use: to buy seeds to grow okra, peppers, and eggplant (local and purple varieties), and to buy herbicides.

loans.name: Bada

texts.fr: Bada est un cultivateur âgé de 36 ans établi dans le village de Ronkh, il est marié et père de 3 enfants.Il a commencé à exercer cette activité de maraîchage depuis qu'il est tout petit avec ses parents.Avec ce crédit, il va acheter du semence de piment, de gombo, de chou, de tomate et d'herbicide.
texts.en:
Bada is a 36-year-old farmer who lives in the village of Ronkh. He is married with three children. He was introduced to market gardening at a young age alongside his parents. 

Bada plans to use this loan to buy seeds to grow okra, peppers, tomatoes, and cabbage. He will also buy herbicides.

loans.use: to buy seeds to grow okra, peppers, tomatoes, and cabbage, and to buy herbicides.

loans.name: Rositas De Pampachililaya Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ROSITAS DE PAMPACHILILAYA”  iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Copacabana, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Faustina es la Prsidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de pescado, tejido de mantas, tejido de chompas, venta de queso.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Faustina es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una promotora de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de pescado; cuenta que este negocio lo implemento por recomendación de su madre quien le enseño este negocio desde niña, cuando decide tener pareja comenzó con el negocio independientemente.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de pescado) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la Ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella vive en unión libre y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución
texts.en:
The communal bank "Rositas de Pampachililaya" will initiate their first loan cycle with Pro Mujer in Copacabana. The group consists of eight members and is governed by a board where Faustina is the chairperson. The members run several businesses such as selling fish, weaving blankets, knitting sweaters, and selling cheese.

The loan they are requesting will benefit small micro entrepreneurs whereof Faustina is one. She says that this is her first loan with Pro Mujer, which she joined upon an invitation from a promoter of the institution who came to her home. Her current business is selling fish, which she initiated on the recommendation of her mother, who taught her this activity from an early age. When she entered a relationship she started her own business.

She will use the loan to buy fish, which she will acquire wholesale in the city of La Paz, and then process and sell in her place of business. This job allows her to generate resources for her household, since she is in a civil union and has three children. 

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes the training offered by the institution.

loans.use: to buy fish

loans.name: Sonia Marcela

texts.es: Sonia de 21 años es una joven muy trabajadora, ella se dedica desde muy temprano del día a atender su pequeña tienda que ha adecuado en su vivienda, además en horas antes del mediodía comienza a  echar tortillas y se ha hecho de una buena clientela. Sonia ha solicitado un préstamo a FUSAI para ampliar su tienda con la compra de más productos que sus clientes le solicitan como: golosinas, bebidas gaseosas, arroz, frijol, azúcar entre otros víveres. Además comprará más maíz para moler y preparar más tortillas. Sonia se compromete a cumplir con el pago de cada cuota del préstamo.
texts.en:
Sonia is a hard-working young woman aged 21. She works from early in the morning in her small store, located in her home. Before noon she also starts making tortillas and she has acquired a good clientele. 

Sonia has requested a loan at FUSAI in order to expand her business, buying more products such as sweets, soft drinks, rice, beans, sugar, and other consumer goods. She will also buy more corn that she will mill in order to make more tortillas. 

Sonia pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy sweets, soft drinks, rice, beans, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Boubacar

texts.en:

With this loan, Boubacar will buy okra, local eggplant and tomato seeds, as well as herbicide.

loans.name: Flor Del Pedregon Group

texts.es: Cuatro son las mujeres que forman este grupo solidario una de las integrantes es doña Flora de 59 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos, su negocio es la venta de ropa y zapatos desde hace 8 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de mercadería de ropa como jeans, camisas, blusas, faldas,  zapatos de todo estilo. Ana de 55 años se dedica a la venta de cosméticos, Brenda de 23 años su negocio es la venta de bisutería, Telma de 36 años de edad su negocio es la venta de comida y ropa.
texts.en:
Four women make up this solidarity group. One of them is Flora, who is 59 years old and is married with two children. She has had a business selling clothing and shoes for the last 8 years. She is asking for the loan to buy clothing such as jeans, shirts, blouses, skirts and all kinds of shoes.

Ana who is 55 sells cosmetics. Brenda is 23 and sells costume jewellery and 36-year-old Telma sells food and clothing.

loans.use: to buy clothing such as jeans, shirts, blouses, skirts and all kinds of shoes.

loans.name: Manzanitas De Chijipata Alto Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “MANZANITAS DE CHIJIPATA ALTO” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Copacabana, está compuesta por diez  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Gregoria es la Presidenta. El negocio que tienen las integrantes de la asociación comunal es la venta de leche, así mismo unas se apoyan con la elaboración tejido de mantas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Gregoria es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promotora de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de queso y leche; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de sus padres, ya que el mismo fue un negocio familiar, cuando inicia a estudiar una carrera decide emprender su propio negocio para financiarse.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de alimento para ganado) que adquirirá de las comunidades del departamento de La Paz y posteriormente lo dará a su ganado, para poder elaborar sus productos. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para sus estudios, ya que ella es soltera  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta los créditos y las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank “MANZANITAS DE CHIJIPATA ALTO”  will be starting its first cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Copacabana centre. It is made up of ten members and is run by a board of directors of which Gregoria is the President. The members of the communal bank run businesses selling milk and some of them support themselves by weaving blankets.

The loan they will take out will benefit small businesswomen of which Gregoria is a member. She says this is the first time she has joined Pro Mujer, after being invited by a promoter from the institution who went to visit her in her home. Currently she has a business selling cheese and milk and she says she learnt the business from her parents as this was the family business. When she began studying for a career she decided to set up her own business to finance herself. 

The loan she will take out is to increase capital to buy animal feed, which she will buy from the communities in the La Paz department. She will feed this to her animals so she can produce her dairy products. This kind of work allows her to generate income for her studies, since she is single. 

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says she likes the loans and the training which the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy feed for livestock.

loans.name: María Marta

texts.es:
Doña María es una persona muy trabajadora de 51 años de edad. Ella no estudio ningún grado escolar, hace 5 años decidió emigrar hacia los Estados Unidos logrando alcanzar el sueño americano, luego volvió hace 2 años a vivir con su familia conformada por 5 hijos, de los cuales uno esta en EE.UU y los 4 que tiene en El Salvador son mayores de 18 años. Una de las hijas es empleada domestica y la otra hija tuvo un accidente que le fracturo la pierna, por eso actualmente no trabajo y los dos jóvenes están estudiando en la universidad. 

Doña María esta totalmente dedicada al cuido de su hija que que tuvo el accidente, ya que requiere de muchos cuidados especiales. Ella es la encargada de hacer todos los oficios domésticos y ayuda también a pagar las cuotas de la universidad a sus hijos.


Con el crédito se  le estará ayudando al cliente, para que pueda comprar algunas alimentos que le servirán para los cuidos de su hija y ademas comprar una silla para que pueda salir.

Doña Maria quiere tener bien amueblada su casa, ya que sus hijo que esta en EE.UU le ayuda en algunos casos.
texts.en:
María, who is 51 years old, is a very hard-working person. She has had no education whatsoever. Five years ago she decided to emigrate to the US to follow the American dream but then returned 2 years ago to live with her family. She has 5 children, one of whom is in the US and the 4 who she has in El Salvador are over 18 years old. One of the daughters works as a domestic help and the other broke her leg in an accident so she is not currently working. The two sons are studying at university. 

María is completely dedicated to looking after the daughter who had the accident, since she needs a lot of special care. María is responsible for doing all of the domestic tasks and she also helps to pay her sons' university fees.

The loan will help this borrower to buy certain foods which she needs for looking after her daughter and also to buy a wheelchair so she can go out. María wants to furnish her house well, since her son who is in the US is helping her out with some items.

loans.use: to buy certain foods which she needs for looking after her daughter and also to buy a wheelchair so she can go out.

loans.use: to buy seeds and herbicide

loans.name: Cheikhou

texts.fr: Cheikhou est cultivateur âgé de 63 ans, il est marié et père de 7 enfants, il a commencé à exercer cette activité depuis qu'il est tout petit.Avec ce crédit, il va acheter du semence et de l'herbicide.
texts.en: Cheikhou is a 63-year-old farmer, who is married and a father to seven children. He started this business when he was very young. With this loan, he will buy seeds and herbicide.

loans.use: to buy seeds and herbicide

loans.name: Alioune

texts.fr: Alioune est cultivateur âgé de 51 ans, il est marié et père de 6 enfants, il exerce cette activité depuis qu'il est tout petit.Avec ce crédit, il va acheter du semence et de l'herbicide.
texts.en: Alioune is a 51-year-old farmer, who is married and father to six children. He started this business when he was very young. With this loan, he will buy seeds and herbicide.

loans.use: to buy seeds and herbicide

loans.name: Lorena Lizeth

texts.es:
La Joven Lorena Lizbeth de 23 años de edad vive su esposo en su casa de habitación ubicada en una aldea de San Lorenzo,  valle al sur de Honduras. Se dedica desde hace ya varios años al negocio de elaboración y venta de utensilios de barro.
Lorena Lizbeth vende lo que son  adornos de forma tortugas, cusucos, floreros, gallos, cubetas, platos, etc. La mayoría de sus clientes son personas  que transitan hacia el Salvador y de regreso los que viajan hacia Tegucigalpa, vende variedad de piezas de artesanía es un ejemplo de trabajo y dedicación.
Lorena Lizbeth está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de tierra, leña y pintura que son la materia prima para elaborar sus productos,  con el apoyo de este crédito pretende mejorar sus ingresos y suplir la necesidad de financiamiento. Su sueño es graduarse de la universidad. 

 San Lorenzo, Honduras - Diciembre del 2013.
texts.en:
Lorena Lizbeth is 23 years old and lives with her husband in their house in a village in San Lorenzo, in the south of Honduras. She has been running her business for several years, making and selling pottery. 

Lorena Lizbeth sells ornaments in the shape of turtles, armadillos, vases, roosters, trays, plates, etc. Most of her customers are people travelling to El Salvador or going back to Tegucigalpa. She sells a variety of handicrafts, and she is very hard-working and dedicated.

Lorena Lizbeth is requesting this loan in order to buy clay, firewood, and paint, which are the materials used to make her products. With the help of this loan she expects to improve her income and supplement her financial needs. 

Her dream is to study at university. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras - December 2013.

loans.use: to buy clay, firewood, and paint for her business

loans.name: Orifi

texts.ru: Орифи 22-летний молодой человек, начинающий свою предпринимательскую деятельность. Он два года работал учеником мастера по ремонту машины и сегодня он уже сам стал хорошим мастером. Орифи живет с женой, родителями и двумя братьями в городе Исфара. Его мать работает в центральной больнице врачом женского отделения. Братья учатся, а жена домохозяйка. Орифи собирается начать собственное дело. Он хочет открыть свою мастерскую и предоставлять услуги по ремонту машины. Орифи уже приобрел помещение. Но для открытия мастерской ему не хватает собсвтенных средств. Орифи просит кредит, на сумму которого он планирует купить аппарат диагностики машины. Благодаря кредиту у него будет собственное дело и условия жизни семьи улучшатся. Он с надеждой ждет поддержки.
texts.en:
Orifi is a 22 years old man, starting an entrepreneurial business. For two years he worked as an apprentice to a car repairman, and he has already become a good repairman himself. Orifi lives with his wife, parents and two brothers in the city of Isfara. His mother works at the central hospital as a medical doctor in the women's section. His brothers study, and his wife is a housewife. 

Orifi decided to start his own business. He would like to open his own workshop and offer a car repair service. Orifi already acquired premises, but he does not have enough money to open the workshop. 

Orifi requests a loan, and with the money he plans to purchase a device to diagnose cars. Thanks to the loan he will have his own business and his family's living conditions will improve. He waits for the support with hope.

loans.use: to purchase a device for diagnosing cars

loans.name: Abdullo

texts.ru:
Этого женатого мужчину зовут Абдулло. Ему 34 года. Он из Куляба. Абдулло с женой имеют троих детей. Дочерям 11 и 8 лет. Младшему сыну 5 лет. Абдулло кормит свою семью с помощью своей работы. Он занимается скотоводством, на своем коровнике выращивает крупно рогатых скотов. Такой деятельности он начал заниматься 5 лет назад. Всем хитростям этой работы Абдулло научился от своего отца. По работе ему в основном помогает его жена. 
  На данный момент у Абдулло затруднения с финансовыми возможностями и он хочет взять кредит. На сумму от кредита Абдулло намерен купить несколько голов бычков, чтобы поддержать свой бизнес. Абдулло надеется, чтобы ему поможете. Он ждет Вашу помощь!
texts.en:
This married man is called Abdullo. He is 34 years old, and from Kulob. Abdullo and his wife have three children. His daughters are 11 and 8 years old, and his youngest son is 5 years old. 

Abdullo feeds his family through his business. He works with livestock breeding. In his cowshed he breeds cattle. He started this business five years ago. Abdullo learned all the tricks of this business from his father. He is helped in his work primarily by his wife. 

Currently Abdullo has difficulties with his finances, and would like to take a loan. Abdullo intends to purchase some bull-calves with the money from the loan, in order to support his business. Abdullo hopes that you will help him. He awaits your help!

loans.use: to purchase bull-calves in order to support his business

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.ru: Гулбахор умелая швея, ей 39 лет, живет в городе Куляб. Она замужем и воспитывает двоих сыновей и двоих дочерей. Ее муж работает за пределами страны, сыновья учатся в школе, а дочери еще маленькие. Гулбахор дома занимается профессией швеи. Вот уже 6 лет как она предоставляет услуги швеи. Гулбахор шьет в основном таджикские национальные платья. Она шьет на очень старой машинке. Теперь Гулбахор хотела бы расширить свою деятельность и с такой целью она запрашивает кредит для покупки модернизированной компьютерной швейной машинки. На этой машинке она будет шить быстрее и качественнее. Таким образом она хочет увеличить количество своих клиенток и расширить дело.
texts.en: Gulbahor is a capable seamstress.  She is 39 years old and she lives in the city of Kulob. She is married and raising two sons and two daughters.  Her husband works outside the country and her sons are in school, but her daughters are still very small.  Gulbahor works as a professional seamstress at home.  For six years she has been offering her sewing services.  She mainly sews Tajik National dresses, and she uses a very old machine.  Now Gulbahor would like to increase her business and with that goal in mind, she is asking for a loan to buy a modern computerized sewing machine on which she can do quality work in less time.  She wants to increase her client base and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy a computerized sewing machine so she can increase her sewing business

loans.name: Zuhriddin

texts.ru: Зухриддин жизнерадостный и позитивный мужчина. Он женат и имеет двоих детей. Живёт он со своей семьёй в горной местности. Зухриддин очень любит  свою семью и делает всё возможное, чтобы они ни в чём не нуждались. Для того, чтобы иметь постоянно доход, Зухриддин занимается своим бизнесом, животноводством. Жена помогает ему в этом деле, так как она домохозяйка и очень трудолюбивая женщина. Зухриддин занимается животноводством вот уже как 10 лет. Он также сотрудничает с Арванд уже давно и является добросовестным клиентом. Сейчас Зукриддин желает расширить поголовье своего скота для увеличения доходности. Для этого он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Он надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Zuhriddin is a happy and positive man. He is married and has two children. He lives together with his family in the highlands. Zuhriddin loves his family very much and does everything possible to make sure they have all they need. To do this, in order to have a stable income, Zuhriddin has his own business of livestock breeding. His wife helps him with the business, as she is a housewife and a very hardworking woman. 

Zuhriddin has worked with livestock breeding for 10 years already. He has collaborated with Arvand for a long time already, and is a conscientious client. Currently Zuhriddin wishes to increase the number of livestock to increase his income. To do this, he turned to Arvand and would like to receive a loan to purchase livestock. He hopes for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for the financial support.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Mwanahamisi

texts.en:
Mwanahamisi is asking for a loan because she believes that through it she will improve her business.

Her previous loan enabled her to save money and get more profits. She still operates her food stall that sells various items including cashew nuts. She is requesting a loan of KES 40,000 to purchase maize flour, cashew nuts, and soft drinks for her business. She feels that she was able to make a good investment with her previous loan, which to date has allowed her to maintain her level of profits to help her family cover their personal expenses.

loans.use: to purchase maize flour, cashew nuts, and soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Ibrahima

texts.fr: Ibrahima est un cultivateur établi dans le département de Dagana, il est âgé de 34, marié et père d'un enfant, il a commencé à exercer cette activité depuis qu'il est tout petit.Avec ce crédit, il va acheter du semence (tomate et onion) et de l'herbicide.
texts.en: Ibrahima is a farmer who lives in the department of Dagana. He is 34 years of age, is married, and has one child. He has worked growing tomatoes and onions since he was very young. With this loan, he will buy seeds (tomato and onion) and herbicide.

loans.use: to buy onion and tomato seeds and herbicide

loans.name: Madienne

texts.fr: Madienne est un cultivateur basé dans le département de dagana, son âge s'élève à 35 ans , il est marié et père de 5 enfants, il a commencé à exercer cette activité de maraîchage depuis qu'il est petit avec ses parents. Avec ce crédit, il va acheter du semence de tomate, d'onions, d'herbicide et de fertilisants.
texts.en: Madienne is a farmer who is based in the department of Dagana. He is 34 years of age, married, and has five children. He has worked growing tomatoes and onions since he was very young. With  this loan, he will buy seeds (tomato and onion), herbicide and fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy onion and tomato seeds, herbicide and fertilizer

loans.name: Priscila

texts.es:
Desde hace varios años Priscila quería estudiar, ella quería tener un mejor futuro, pero desafortunada mente ella no contaba con suficiente dinero ni el apoyo de nadie. 
Un cierto día dijo este año iba a estudiar e hizo cuentas de todo lo que se gastaba en casa, al hacer sumas y restas  vio que los hijos necesitaban más cosas para el colegio y ese año decidió no estudiar ella, pensó primero en el estudio de  los hijos, en el transcurso de los días conoció personas, ellos  hablaban de las clases y como habían facilidades de pago. 
Este año vio la oportunidad y ella decide estudiar  esta carrera,  a ella le gustaría trabajar en un futuro en los hospitales, ya que hace 2 años trabajo en un hospital en el archivo al lado de urgencias y vio que en la salud necesitan gente con buen servicio, humildad y una mano amiga ya que en esos momentos es cuando ellos necesitan de la ayuda de los demás, tienen que mirar desde muy adentro de nuestro ser, y ver que ellos son personas enfermas con necesidades y dificultades y no cuentan con los recursos suficientes. 
Priscila para poder lograr esto necesita prepararse y estudiar seguir con los contactos en la rama de la salud, para tener mejores propuestas de trabajo en los hospitales y clínicas y seguir adelante con los hijos y poderles brindar  universidad ya que sin un titulo es muy difícil conseguir un trabajo bueno.
Ella agradece  a convenio KIVA para que ellos la tengan en cuenta, ella necesita de la colaboración para cumplir una meta importante para la vida personal, ya que desde muchos años esto es un sueño y ella lo quiere cumplir estudiando administración en salud y poder salir adelante con los hijos y padres.
texts.en:
For many years Priscila had wanted to study, as she wanted to have a better future, but unfortunately she did not have enough money or anyone to support her. One day she said that she was going to study that year and she  did her calculations of everything she spent at home. After doing the additions and subtractions, she realised that the children needed more things for school and so she decided not to study that year as she put her children's studies first. As the days went by she met people who spoke to her about the classes and how there were payment facilities. 

This year she saw her opportunity and decided to study a course. In the future she would like to work in hospitals, because 2 years ago she worked in filing next to the emergency department of a hospital. There she saw that in healthcare there is a need for people who have a good way with others, who are unassuming and prepared to give a helping hand, since these are the occasions when people need help from others. It is important to look deep inside ourselves and realise that they are ill people with needs and difficulties and they don't have enough money.

In order to achieve this Priscila needs to study and follow up on her contacts in the area of health so she can have better work prospects in hospitals and clinics. This will enable her to bring up her children and provide them with a university education, since it is very difficult to get a good job without a degree. 

Priscila is grateful for the Kiva agreement under which she could be considered. She needs the support in order to achieve an important personal goal in life, as this has been her dream for several years. She wants to realise this dream by studying health administration so she can make progress in life with her children and parents.

loans.use: to pay the fees for a semester.

loans.name: Mejumaa

texts.en: Mejumaa is married woman with four school-going children. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and food for the family. For the past four years, she has operated a food stall business, selling to her neighbours and passersby. She mentioned price fluctuation as her major challenge. She dreams of establishing a wholesale shop in the future. With her KES 20,000 loan Mejumaa wants to purchase wheat flour, cooking oil, maize flour, and sweets for resale. She decided to join Yehu to get financial support.

loans.use: to purchase wheat flour, cooking oil, maize flour, and sweets for resale.

loans.name: Odinamo

texts.ru: Одинамо деятельная и предприимчивая женщина, проживающая в городе Куляб. Ей 55 лет. Она замужем, имеет троих сыновей, невестку и двух внуков. Семья Одинамо большая и дружная и год за годом расширяется. Один ее сын работает в столице и имеет там продуктовый магазин. Одинамо тоже планирует заняться данным бизнесом, но собирается открыть магазин в своем городе Куляб. Она уже построила помещение для магазина рядом с домом. Осталось закупить товар и приступить к торговле. Однако средств Одинамо не хватает для этой цели и в связи с этим она обратилась за кредитом. Одинамо на сумму кредита собирается закупить широкий ассортимент продуктов питания. Открыв новый бизнес, Одинамо обеспечит работой не только себя, но и остальных своих сыновей. Поэтому этот кредит ей очень нужен. Поддержите ее!
texts.en:
Odinamo is an active and enterprising woman, who lives in the city of Kulob. She is 55 years old. She is married and has three sons, a daughter-in-law and two grandchildren. Odinamo's family is large and friendly, and it increases every year. 

One of Odinamo's sons works in the capital and has a grocery store there. Odinamo also plans to work in this type of business, but she decided to open a grocery store in her own city, Kulob. She already built premises for the store next to her home. What remains is to purchase goods and start selling. However, Odinamo does not have enough money for this, and therefore she applied for a loan. Odinamo has decided to purchase a broad assortment of food products for the loan amount. 

After having opened the new business, Odinamo will provide a job not only for herself, but also for the other sons. Therefore, she needs this loan very much. Please help her!

loans.use: to purchase food products in order to open a grocery store

loans.name: Nasib

texts.ru: Насиб жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина. Он женат и имеет детей. Насиб со своей женой живут счастливо и стараются воспитывать своих детей хорошими людьми, он и его жена очень рады растить своих детей. Для того, чтобы иметь доход на проживание Насиб занимается своим любимым делом. Насиб долгое время работает таксистом. У него имеется для этого собственный автомобиль. Но эта машина служит ему уже долгое время и много раз приходилось её чинить. Поэтому сейчас он планирует купить новую, более улучшенную машину для ведения и расширения своего бизнеса. Этот бизнес приносит Насибу хороший доход, но его хватает только на проживание. А для того, чтобы купить новую машину требуются денежные средства.Поэтому Насиб обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку машины для ведения своего бизнеса. Он надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Nasib is a happy and hardworking man. He is married and has children. Nasib and his wife live happily together and try to raise their children to be good people. He and his wife are very happy to raise their children. To do this, in order to have money for living, Nasib works with his favorite activity. For a long time he has worked as a taxi driver. 

Nasib has his own car. It has however served him for a long time already, so he has had to fix it many times. Therefore he currently plans to purchase a new and better car to conduct and expand his business. 

This business brings Nasib a good income, but it is only enough to cover living expenses. To purchase a new car he needs financial means. Therefore, Nasib turned to Arvand and would like to receive a loan to purchase a new car to conduct his business. He hopes for a positive result and thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy a car

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en: Beatrice lives in Sinkor, which is in Montserrado County. She is 47 years old and married with two children, ages 20 and 28. Both children are in school and live at home. For the past 10 years, Beatrice has been selling dry meat in the community market. She started this business with the help of her husband and learned this way of selling from her mother. She spends eight hours a day on her business. Beatrice says, "I am business-minded, and I like my business because it enables me to earn profits." She is requesting a loan to buy more dry bush meat to expand her sales. She intends to use the profits from her business to pay for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy more dry bush meat to expand her sales.

loans.name: Bintihamisi

texts.en: Bintihamisi is a married woman with four children, all of whom are in school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food. For the past year, she has operated a business selling lesos (women's wraps) and coconuts. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of operation. She dreams of expanding to become a big supplier of clothes in the future. With her KES 30,000 loan Bintihamisi wants to purchase 40 pieces of leso cloth and sacks of coconuts for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase 40 pieces of leso cloth and sacks of coconuts for resale.

loans.name: Juana Del Carmen

texts.es:
Juana de 45 años de edad, estudio hasta cuarto grado. Ella es madre soltera: tiene dos hijos de 18 y 24 años de edad, su hija estudia noveno grado y el hijo no estudia ya que ella no alcanza a darle el estudio a ambos.

La cliente vive con sus dos hijos y su madre, ella se ha dedicado desde su juventud a la agricultura, lo aprendio de sus padres que siempre se han dedicado al trabajo de campo, despues de que su padre fallecio solo ella lleva el sustento a su casa.

Juana utilizara el préstamo para comprar abonos, semillas y otros articulos que necesita para mejorar sus cultivos, ya que ella siembra maiz, frijol y un huerto de tomates, chiles, rabanos, entre otros. Con este préstamo ella va incrementar su negocio ya que se dedica a vender de lo que produce y de esa manera poder darle el estudio a su hija, su sueño dice que es a futuro poder ver a sus hijos como profecionales darles una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, ya que ella es madre soltera y de lo que ella produce esque mantiene a su madre y sus dos hijos. El trabajo a ella le queda a una cuadra de su casa, su madre y sus hijos le ayudan a ella ya que el trabajo es bastante, su horario de trabajo ella se lo pone, hay veces que sale de su casa a las 6 de la mañana y regresa hasta las 2 de la tarde, para  ir a vender lo que ella produce, este prestamo le ayudara de gran manera a solventar sus problemas y a tener una mejor oportunidad para producir y a futuro tener un puesto en el mercado municipal.
texts.en:
Juana, 45, has a fourth grade education.  She is a single mother and has two children, ages 18 and 24.  Her daughter is in ninth grade and her son no longer studies because she cannot pay for both to have an education.

The borrower lives with her two children and her mother.  From a very young age she has worked in farming which she learned from her parents who have always been farmers.  After her father passed away she became the only one to earn an income for the household.

Juana will use the loan to buy fertilizers and seeds, as well as other supplies, to improve her crops.  She grows corn, beans, tomatoes, peppers, radishes, etc.  With the loan she can increase her business and sell more produce so she can pay for her daughter's education.  Her dream is to see her children become professionals so their families can have a better quality of life.  The income Juana earns is what supports her mother and two children, since she is a single mother.

Her work is about one block from home and her mother and the two children help out considerably.  Juana establishes her own work schedule but sometimes leaves home in the morning at 6:00 a.m. and returns at 2:00 p.m. to sell her produce.  This loan will help resolve some of her problems and give her a better opportunity to produce more so she can have a stall at the municipal market.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and seeds to plant more crops.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en: Rebecca is 36 years old and married with six children between the ages of 4 and 19. She lives in Sinkor, a neighborhood within Monrovia, the capital city of Liberia. For the past three years she has been selling fish from a table in the market. She started this business with the help of her father and learned how to sell from him. She enjoys selling for the profits it brings and because it makes her popular and well-known. Rebecca is requesting her 6th loan from BRAC Liberia to buy more fish for her business. With her anticipated profits she wants to build her family a house.

loans.use: to buy more fish for her business.

loans.name: Monica Ximena

texts.es:
Mónica Ximena es una mujer emprendedora, responsable, con ganas de salir adelante por ella y por el hijo.
El sueño de Mónica siempre ha sido estudiar un carrera que esté relacionada con salud, ayudar a las personas, orientándolos a distintas consecuencias o problemas.
Una de las características,  es el gusto por este tema, las metas son estudiar y trabajar muy juiciosa y fuertemente para poder más adelante estudiar la carrera profesional y poco a poco mejorar los ingresos para un buen futuro.
Mónica esta consiente que para poder cumplir con los sueños y todas las metas que tiene debe ser muy juiciosa, responsable, puntual, ordenad y constante  en cuanto a el estudio y el trabajo con todo lo que esto acarrea; y está dispuesta hacer lo que sea necesario para llegar a eso.
Gracias a una oportunidad que le están brindando con kiva  para poder estudiar, va hacer muy aplicada y va a sacar adelante el estudio y el hijo  para poder labrarse un buen futuro, una excelente calidad de vida y ser mejor persona con el pasar de los días. Siendo profesional una excelente mujer, persona y madre.
El hijo Julián es la fuerza, el motor, la motivación para salir adelante; desea que en un futuro él se sienta orgulloso de ella no solo por ser la persona que le dio la vida si no también por ser responsable y una mujer profesional que a pesar de haberlo tenido tan joven a él salió adelante.
texts.en:
Mónica Ximena is a responsible entrepreneur with much determination to get ahead for her and her son.  Her dream has always been to get a degree in a health-related field to help people and counsel them on different problems and their consequences.

She enjoys the health field and her goal is to work hard to get a professional degree so she can improve her income little by little for a better future.

Mónica is consicious of the fact that in order to meet her goals she must have good judgement, and be responsible, punctual, orderly and consistent in her studies and work, no matter what that may be.  She is willing to do everything necessary to do this.

Thanks to this opportunity from Kiva, she plans to study hard and get an education so her son can have a good future, an excellent quality of life and be a better person each day, and as a professional become an excellent woman, person and mother.  Her son, Julián, gives her strength and is her motivation for persisting.  In the future she wants him to be proud of her not only for being his mother but for being a responsible, professional woman who was able to get ahead despite being such a young mother.

loans.use: To pay for semester tuition.

loans.name: Valbona

texts.en: Valbona is 36 years old and has two children aged 16 and 11. She has been operating a livestock and agricultural type of activity while her husband has been in construction. They sell the raw milk to a local dairy farm; as for the agriculture, Valbona’s focus has been more in planting & harvesting apple orchards and selling them at the market. The region where she comes from is known for the quality & also the quantity of apples; they have their own brand name. Valbona wants to add some sheep to her herd of cows; this is where she will invest this loan and she hopes that with the lenders’ help she will be able to achieve it.

loans.use: to add sheep to her herd of dairy cows

loans.name: Oscar Humberto

texts.es: Oscar en un joven de 29 años de edad quien desde hace algún tiempo se ha dedicado a comercializar Horchata en Pasta que por la buena combinación de sus ingredientes en toda la zona se ha hecho de buena clientela. Oscar ha solicitado un préstamo a FUSAI para comprar más semilla de Morro, Cacao, Arroz, Semilla de Ayote, Ajonjolí, Canela y demás ingredientes para la elaboración de la Horchata en Pasta. Con ello espera proponer su buen producto a otros puestos del mercado o tienda de su localidad y alcanzar mayores ingresos.
texts.en:
Oscar is a young man aged 29. Since some time back he sells paste for making horchata [a cold, sweet drink made from seeds and sugar]. Thanks to his good recipe he has a large clientele in the area.

Oscar has requested a loan at FUSAI in order to buy more calabash seeds, cocoa, rice, pumpkin seeds, sesame, cinnamon, and other ingredients for making horchata paste.

Thus, he hopes to offer his products in other markets or stores in his area and improve his incomes.

loans.use: to buy calabash seeds, cocoa, rice, pumpkin seeds, sesame, etc.

loans.name: Monicah

texts.en: Monicah is a 38 year old married woman. She has 3 children. She describes herself as honest. She operates a farm where she grows crops. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. Her business is located in a fertile place with favorable climatic conditions and her primary customers are retail customers. She describes her biggest business challenge to be the high prices of farm inputs. Monicah will use her KES 20,000 loan to buy farm inputs such as fertilizer, seeds, etc. Her business goal is to be large-scale farmer within 5 years. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM. She will use the anticipated profits to improve her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as fertilizer, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Saparbu

texts.ru: Сапарбу 65 лет, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 детей. У Сапарбу - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Сапарбу занимается животноводством, стартовав 16 лет назад, с покупки скота на 30,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Сапарбу, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 2 дойные коровы, 2 бычка и 10 овец. Имеются все условия для содержания скота, сено и корма заготовлены. В зимний период скот содержит в сарае, летом отправляет на пастбища, нанимает чабана для присмотра. Также по хозяйству помогают сыновья.  Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Сапарбу обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку коров для откорма с последующей реализацией на рынке по высокой цене. Доходы от кредита Сапарбу планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и намерена собрать средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en:
Saparbu is 65 and married with two children. She has a high school education and works in animal husbandry as the primary source of income for her family, a business she began 16 years ago with the purchase of livestock for 30,000 KGS.
