"I'm Enrique, I'm married and I live in the house that I own with my wife and my six children. Only two of my children still depend on me. I have a had a garage for 15 years. The business is based in my home and, fortunately, it's going well - I tend to my friends who own buses and taxis and so I have many customers. Sometimes I also drive a bus. I am applying for this loan in order to buy a hydraulic jack and some tools for my workshop. I like to carry out my promises and to be responsible.

I have been able to help my family prosper and I gave all of my children an education. Now most of them are married. My challenges are to get my business in shape and to keep growing."

loans.use: to buy a hydraulic jack and tools for his workshop.

loans.name: Gulsara

texts.en:
The mother of three children whose well-being is her priority, Gulsara, born in 1960, is married to a mechanic who earns a small salary. Gulsara has worked in a state organization for last 10 years and is known to her colleagues as a kind woman. 

Two of Gulsara’s children are students. Due to insufficient family funds, she is requesting this loan to pay for her daughter’s tuition at the university. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To pay for her daughter’s education

loans.name: María Leonor

texts.es:
María, una mujer de 60 años de edad, de nacionalidad ecuatoriana, decidió radicarse en Colombia desde hace 40 años, decisión que tomó con el ideal de buscar nuevos horizontes para salir adelante, luego de radicarse en la ciudad donde vive actualmente, comenzó a vender mercancía que importaba desde su país y, luego de un tiempo pudo establecerse en un punto fijo del centro de la ciudad, allí trabaja sola todos los días de 9:00 am a 7:00 pm y así se ha ganado la vida durante las últimas 4 décadas y además le ha podido brindar educación universitaria a sus 3 hijos.
El apoyo del crédito lo solicita para comprar mercancía al por mayor (cobijas, chaquetas, ruanas, entre otros), esto le permitirá abastecerse con más variedad de productos y satisfacer los gustos de sus clientes, mejorando las ventas y sus ingresos.
María, impulsada por su dedicación, empeño y perseverancia, desea seguir trabajando para llegar a cumplir el sueño de adquirir su casa propia y fortalecer su negocio, para que le brinde la oportunidad de disfrutar una vejez tranquila  con mejores condiciones de vida, en compañía de sus familiares.
texts.en:
María is a 60 year old woman. She is Ecuadorian and decided to live in Colombia 40 years ago. She made that decision with the ideal of seeking new horizons to get ahead. After moving to the city she lives in now, she started to sell merchandise that she would import from her country. After a while she was able to set up in a permanent spot in the center of town. She works there every day from 9:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. That is how she has earned a living for the last 4 decades. She has also been able to give her three children a college education. 

She has asked for the  support of a loan to buy merchandise wholesale, such as blankets, jackets, ponchos and more. This will allow her to stock up with a wider variety of products and satisfy her customers' tastes, improving sales and her income. 

María, driven by her dedication, hard work and perseverance, wants to continue working to be able to make her dream come true of acquiring her own home and fortifying her business. This will give her the chance of a peaceful old age with improved living conditions in the company of her family.

loans.use: to buy merchandise wholesale such as blankets, jackets, ponchos and more.

loans.name: Laura Tatiana

texts.es:
Ella es Laura tatiana, finalizo los estudios de secundaria el año pasado, Vive junto a la hermana menor en una institución que atiende jóvenes en situación de discapacidad cognitiva bajo medida de protección del Instituto Colombiano de Bienestar Familiar. Presenta retardo mental leve, por esta razón desde muy pequeña vive bajo el amparo del Estado. 

Desde muy pequeña se quedo sin padres, por lo que junto a la hermana han  vivido en diferentes instituciones de protección. Le encanta estudiar y el sueño que tiene es lograr vivir independiente junto con la hermana.

Ya que es una persona que vive solo con la hermana y no tiene ninguna ayuda económica es indispensable que tenga el convenio con kiva, ya que con la ayuda que le hacen le podrían colaborar a pagar el estudio.
texts.en:
Laura Tatiana finished her high school studies last year. She lives with her younger sister in an institution that serves youths with cognitive disabilities as a protective measure by the Instituto Colombiano de Bienestar Familiar (Colombian Institute for Family Welfare).  She has mild mental retardation and for this reason has lived under the care of the state since a very young age.

Since she was very young she has been without parents so with her sister they have lived in many care institutions. Laura Tatiana loves studying and her dream is to be able to live independently with her sister. 

As a person who lives alone with her sister and has no financial support, it is essential to have this collaboration with Kiva. With the help that this loan provides she would be able to pay for her education.

loans.use: to pay for a semester of tuition.

loans.name: Irlanda Marilux

texts.es:
EL Grupo De Crédito 20 De Abril se reúne cada 15 días en el Cantón Montecristi  conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.
En este lugar vive la señora Irlanda,  tiene 61 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun vive en su casa. El marido es comerciante. 
Doña Irlanda se desempeña como maestra en una escuela de la localidad y también se dedica al comercio, vende ropa y de productos de Avon (productos de belleza, cosméticos, perfumería y accesorios para damas). Trabaja todos los  días ya que de lunes a viernes trabaja en la escuela y los fines de semana se dedican a vender sus productos, también vende en su lugar de trabajo ya que sus compañeras y madres de familia son sus mejores clientes, ella deja a crédito y cobra cada quince días. Tiene 10 años que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual se ayuda para salir adelante.
Este crédito es para comprar perfumes, cremas, cosméticos y ropa de todo tipo. Lleva tres años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le permiten salir adelante. Su sueño es tener una boutique.
texts.en:
The “20 de Abril” credit group meets every 15 days in the Montecristi Canton, known for its rich pre-colonial culture, and for its crafts—which are nationally and internationally renowned. And, it is the home of the famous Panama hats.

Señora Irlanda, who is 61 years old, lives here. She has a common-law marriage, from which she has three children who are now adults, one of whom still lives in her house. Her husband is a businessman.

Doña Irlanda is a teacher in the local school, and she also works selling clothing and Avon products (beauty products, cosmetics, perfumes, and accessories for ladies).

She works every day—Monday through Friday she teaches, and she sells her products on the weekends. She also sells at her workplace, as her friends and the mothers of the schoolchildren are her best customers. She sells on credit and collects every 15 days. 

She has been working in this occupation for 10 years, and it has helped her to get by. 

This loan is for the purchase of perfumes, creams, cosmetics, and clothing of all kinds. She has been a member of the credit group for three years, and she likes it because the loans help her to move forward. 

Her dream is to have a boutique.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, creams, cosmetics, and clothing.

loans.name: Orfa Mariana

texts.es:
En el sector del Colegio Uruguay en la ciudad de Portoviejo conocido como La Ciudad De Los Reales Tamarindos, ciudad bella y hospitalaria, se reúnen cada quince días las socias del Grupo De Crédito Buenos Amigos.
En este lugar vive la señora Orfa, tiene 66 años de edad, hace varios años su esposo falleció pero de esa relación tiene dos hijos  mayores de edad,  ambos aun vive con ella. 
Doña Orfa es una mujer muy luchadora que le gusta a base de esfuerzo ganar lo suyo y salir adelante, ella tiene un local en su casa en la cual distribuye agua en bidón,  su local es muy concurrido ya que son muchos los clientes que llegan hasta allí para comprar este liquido vital, ella también entrega a domicilio con la ayuda de uno de sus hijos. Tiene 3 años este negocio con el cual sale adelante.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar bidones de agua. Está desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le son de mucha ayuda en su negocio y su vida. Su sueño es tener buena salud ella y sus hijos que tanto quiere.
texts.en:
In the Colegio Uruguay sector of the city of Portoviejo, known as the City of the Royal Tamarind Trees, a beautiful and hospitable city, the Grupo De Crédito [lending group] Buenos Amigos [good friends] meets every two weeks.
Here lives Orfa, 66 years old. Several years ago her husband passed away, but she has two adult children from this relationship, both of whom live with her.
Orfa is a very determined woman who likes to earn her way through life and keep moving forward through her own efforts. She has a shop in her house from which she sells water in 5-gallon bottles. Her shop is very busy, since she has many customers who go there to buy this vital liquid. She also delivers, with the help of one of her children. She has had this business for 3 years and has  been getting by.
She is going to use this loan to buy 5-gallon bottles of water. She has been with the Grupo De Crédito since it started, and she likes it because the loans are a big help in her business and her life. Her dream is good health for her and her children, whom she loves very much.

loans.use: to buy 5-gallon bottles of water.

loans.name: Elena Del Rocio

texts.es:
Elena es una señora de 45 años, vive junto a su esposo y su hija de 17 años. Cuentan con casa propia en la ciudad de Santo Domingo, una ciudad con un clima cálido húmedo, conocida también por ser un sector muy productivo y comercial. 
Elena es propietaria de una tienda, hace 3 años emprendió en este negocio ya que aprovechó que su casa se encuentra frente a un colegio, un gran sitio estratégico para las ventas. Poco a poco ha ido mejorando su tiendita y ha incrementado mercadería, su hija y su esposo también le ayudan con la atención al cliente, tiene el apoyo de su familia.
Elena es una señora con carisma y emprendedora, acudió a Fundación Alternativa con la finalidad de obtener un crédito para ampliar su local, su sueño es hacer en un futuro un micro mercado, la institución le dio la oportunidad de hacer su sueño realidad, Elena se siente muy agradecida con la Fundación y el proyecto Kiva, ya que así mejorará la atención a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Elena is a 45 year old woman who lives with her husband and her 17 year old daughter. They have their own home in the city of Santo Domingo, a city with a warm humid climate known to be a very productive commercial sector.

Elena is the owner of a store. She opened it 3 years ago taking advantage that her home is across from a school, a great location for sales. Little by little she has improved her small store and has increased her merchandise. Her daughter and her husband also help her to serve the customers so she has the support of her family.

Elena is an enterprising woman with charisma. She went to Foundation Alternative in order to obtain a loan in order to expand her facility. Her dream is to have a mini-market in the future. Elena is very grateful to the institution and the Kiva loaners for giving her the opportunity to make her dream come true, as this is the way she will improve customer service.

loans.use: to expand her facility

loans.name: Daniela

texts.es:
Daniela es una joven emprendedora y dinámica, con tan solo 19 años de edad es madre soltera de un bebé de 4 meses de nacido. Luego de culminar sus estudios secundarios comenzó a trabajar como mesera en una cafetería que posteriormente logró subarrendar con el fin de percibir ingresos por cuenta propia. Lleva manejando el negocio aproximadamente un año y medio, en el que ha logrado generar los recursos para el sustento propio y de su pequeño hijo.
Con el ánimo de fortalecer el negocio, solicita el apoyo del crédito para comprar sillas y surtido al por mayor (café, mecato, gaseosas, entre otros), esto le permitirá abastecerse para satisfacer los gustos de sus compradores y mejorar las ventas, pues tendrá una mejor capacidad instalada para que sus clientes estés cómodos y se sientan bien atendidos.
Daniela es una joven soñadora pero también es consciente que para lograr sus metas debe trabajar con empeño y perseverancia, así podrá cumplir el sueño de tener su negocio con los activos propios y con mayor cantidad de surtido; así podrá forjar el futuro para que su hijo tenga un mejor bienestar y educación de calidad.
texts.en:
Daniela is a young and dynamic entrepreneur. She is only 19 years old and single mother of a 4-month-old baby. After completing secondary school she started working as a waitress in a café which she could later sublet with the aim of generating income for herself. She has had this business for approximately one and a half year and she has succeeded in generating the resources to support herself and her small son.

In an effort to strengthen her business, she has asked for a loan to help her buy chairs and supplies in bulk (coffee, snacks, and soft drinks, among others). This will help her to stock up in order to meet the tastes of her customers and to improve her sales and to have a wider variety of products so that her customers are comfortable and well attended to.

Daniela is a young woman with many drams, but she is aware that in order to achieve her aims she has to work hard and with perseverance. Thus she will be able to fulfill her dream of having her own business with her own assets and with a wider range of products, and to shape the future so that her son will have better living conditions and a better education.

loans.use: to buy chairs and supplies in bulk (coffee, snacks, soft drinks, among others).

loans.name: Mburica Poty Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mburica Poty integrado  por  20 mujeres, están en  el 6to ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante, además de eso también forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, haciendo a su vez la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza.
Carmen es miembro de este grupo, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de insumos de primera necesidad, que vende a todos sus clientes del barrio. Con mucho esfuerzo y por sobre todo con su trabajo está saliendo adelante y dando a su familia lo que necesita.
Pide de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de bebidas, galletitas, jabones, aceites, y demás, y así poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo, a la vez que lucha por poder mejorar su vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
The Mburica Poty group is made up of 20 women.  They're in their 6th loan cycle of the Women's Committee Program where everyone helps each other succeed.  They are also part of the Poverty Elimination Program, on a mission to put an end to poverty.  

Carmen is a member of this group.  She buys basic necessities and sells them to all her clients in the neighborhood.  With great effort and through all her work, she's getting ahead and giving her family what they need.

Carmen is seeking this loan to invest in the purchase of drinks, cookies, soaps, oils, and other items so she can continue selling, which she'll do while she fights to be able to improve her and her family's life.

loans.use: to buy drinks, cookies, soaps, oils, and other items to sell.

loans.name: Levon

texts.en:
Levon lives in Kapan city in Syunik region. He is married and he has two children.  In the nearby village Geghi, for 20 years, he has been running a large and successful farm. During the year, he manages to sell a lot of milk and meat (with seven cows and two calves). He also sells large amounts of potatoes and beans. All these he sells at the city wholesale market through resellers. He also has a truck, which he uses to transfer cargo from time to time. 

Levon considers himself as a skilled and lucky farmer who manages to solve any problems connected with his farm, and as a result, he earns a decent income for his family. 

He asks for a loan of 1,100,000 Armenian drams in order to buy hay and potato seedlings, and he wants to repair the engine of his truck.

loans.use: to buy hay and potato seedlings, and he wants to repair the engine of his truck.

loans.name: Eduardo Rafael

texts.es: La familia de Eduardo Rafael se ha dedicado por varias generaciones a la producción de café y él es socio de la Unión Regional desde hace 3 años y es allí a donde entrega la totalidad de su producción para que sea procesada y exportada. Para esta cosecha necesita un crédito el cual utilizará para el pago de cortadores de café y para la reparación de su camioneta la cual utiliza para transportar su café.
texts.en: Eduardo Rafael’s family has been raising coffee for generations and he has been a member of the regional union for three years and it’s there where he delivers his total harvest to be processed and exported.  He needs a loan so he can pay for laborers for this harvest and to repair his truck to transport the coffee.

loans.use: to pay for labor and repair his truck.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
Luz es una madre y esposa ejemplar, conocida por su carisma y buena energía. A sus 52 años de edad se dedica a trabajar en su propio taller de confección, que inició hace más de 20 años, como una alternativa para generar recursos y aportar a la economía del hogar, cuenta con el apoyo de dos empleados fijos y presta el servicio de confección a terceros, elaborando ropa para niños, trabaja todos los días desde las primeras horas de la mañana para aprovechar al máximo el tiempo y poder cumplir con la producción requerida.
El propósito con el crédito es comprar una máquina recubridora, con la que podrá agilizar el proceso de producción y entregar los pedidos de manera oportuna, dándole la posibilidad de adquirir contratos más grandes.
Luz desea seguir luchando por sacar adelante su negocio, acreditarlo y fortalecerlo cada día para que siga siendo rentable y le permita dar una educación universitaria a sus hijos; para que se forjen un futuro más exitoso y próspero.
texts.en:
Luz is an exemplary mother and wife, known for her charisma and bountiful energy. At 52 years of age, she is dedicated to working in her own dressmaking shop, which she began more than 20 years ago as an alternative means of generating income to support the household economy. Luz can count on the help of 2 permanent employees and she sends out finishing work to third parties. Luz makes children's clothes, working every day from early morning to take maximum advantage of time and to be able to comply with her orders.

Luz's proposition for the loan is to purchase a cover-lock sewing machine, enabling her to speed up production and deliver orders in an opportune manner, promising the possibility of acquiring larger contracts.

Luz wants to continue striving to advance her business, giving it more credibility and strength each day, so that it can continue to be profitable. She wishes to be able to provide a university education for her children, enabling them to forge a more successful and prosperous future.

loans.use: to buy a cover-lock sewing machine and advance production.

loans.name: Rosalba

texts.es:
Rosalba, una madre ejemplar de 40 años de edad, trabaja incansablemente para sacar a su hija de 10 años adelante; diariamente trabaja vendiendo mercancía como jeans y calzado, sus principales clientes son vecinos, familiares y amigos, así ha generado recursos económicos para solventar las necesidades del hogar durante los últimos 10 años.
Con el ánimo de fortalecer su negocio, solicita el préstamo para comprar mercancía al por mayor (zapatos, sandalias, jeans, entre otros), esto le permitirá tener más variedad de artículos para satisfacer los gustos de sus compradores y, espera que las ventas aumenten en esta temporada navideña, lo que le permitirá mejorar los ingresos.
Rosalba es una mujer luchadora y siempre va en busca de nuevas alternativas que le permitan salir adelante, sobrepasando diversos obstáculos que se le presentan con las dificultades de salud que tiene su hija, lo cual demanda gran cantidad de dinero que afecta la estabilidad económica, sin embargo, esto no es impedimento para seguir esforzándose día a día; así podrá cumplir el sueño de poder costear un tratamiento completo para su hija y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar, para que sea feliz.
texts.en:
Rosalba an exemplary 40 year old mother, works tirelessly to get her 10 year old daughter ahead. She works daily selling merchandise such as jeans and shoes. Her main customers are neighbors, family members and friends. In this way she has generated financial resources to pay for the necessities in the home for the last 10 years.

With the purpose of fortifying her business, she is asking for the loan to buy merchandise wholesale, such as shoes, sandals, jeans, and more. This will allow her to have a wider variety of items to satisfy the tastes of her buyers. She hopes sales will increase in this Christmas season, which will allow her to improve her income.

Rosalba is a woman who is a fighter and who is always looking for alternatives that will allow her to get ahead, overcoming different obstacles that come along with the health problems that her daughter has. This demands a large quantity of money which affects her financial stability. Nonetheless, this is not an impediment to keep striving day to day. This way, she can make her dream come true of being able to pay for a complete treatment for her daughter and offer her a better quality of life and well being so that she can be happy.

loans.use: to buy merchandise wholesale such as shoes, sandals, jeans, and more.

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie, 30 years old and married, is happy tending her little store, which is her means of earning a living in support to her family. Fortunately, it is located in a populous neighborhood, so she makes good daily sales. 

Now in her fourth year of membership in Paglaum PMPC and confident that she can remain a member in good standing, Rosalie has requested a loan of PHP 20,000 to expand her inventory. She believes that with PMPC's support, as one family they will sustain and beat the competition of other stores in the area.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock for her sari-sari store

loans.name: Rosenda

texts.en: Rosenda, 62 years old, is married and has 3 children. She lives in Macabayao, Jimenez, Philippines. Rosenda is a farmer who has been selling copra (dried coconut meat used for oil production) for 2 years. She has requested a loan to purchase additional copra to sell. Rosenda has been a member of PMPC for 5 years. In the future, she hopes to save for emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase additional copra to sell

loans.name: Yrene

texts.es:
Yrene tiene 45 años de edad, vive junto a su hijo en el distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicado a dos horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la venta de comida preparada por ella misma desde hace más de catorce años, es una mujer emprendedora, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de insumos para su negocio sacos de arroz, bidones de aceite, azúcar, gaseosas, entre otros y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Yrene is 45 years old and lives with her son in the Oyotún district which is located two hours outside Chiclayo, in the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru. Her community works in agriculture, trade, ranching.

Yrene works selling prepared food and has been doing so for 14 years. She is an entrepreneurial woman.

She has applied for 1500 Nuevo Soles to buy food supplies for her business such as bags of rice, drums of oil, sugar, sodas, and others. This way she can make more income for her family.

loans.use: to buy food supplies for her business

loans.name: Bacilio

texts.es:
Bacilio tiene 39 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el Caserío de Contando una zona rural del distrito de Pucará una comunidad que se caracteriza por su clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura especialmente cultivo de café, frutales, arroz entre otros, comercio y ganadería a dos horas de la ciudad de Jaén, que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte público en su propia mototaxi, trasladando a sus pasajeros a los caseríos aledaños a su distrito, es conocido en la zona por la labor que realiza, ha solicitado un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles para mantenimiento de su vehículo y de esta manera seguir brindando el servicio, generando ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Bacilio is 39 years old. He lives with his wife and children in the village of Contando in a rural area of the Pucará district, a community that is known for its warm climate. The people work in agriculture, especially growing coffee, fruit, rice and more, and in commerce and livestock. It’s some two hours from the city of Jaén, that belongs in the Cajamarca region, in the northern highlands of Peru.

He works providing public transport with his own moto-taxi (motorcycle taxi), driving passengers to the surrounding villages in his district, and is known for the work he does. He is requesting a loan of 500 soles to use for maintenance of his vehicle so that he can continue providing service, and generating income for his family.

loans.use: for vehicle maintenance so he can continue providing service

loans.name: Salim

texts.en:
Salim is a 39-year-old man. He has two children with the ages of 2 years and 10 years. He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his motorcycle. He has been involved in this business for five years. 

He also does dairy farming to earn extra income His business is located in a rural area and his primary customers are regular customers. He describes his biggest business challenge to be the poor road network. He will use the KES 50,000 loan to purchase a dairy cow. This will enable him increase milk production, hence increasing his income. 

His business goal is to be the best within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will educate his children to a higher level. This is his third loan with SMEP DTM. His previous loan of KES 20,000 was repaid successfully. He will use the anticipated profits to build a permanent house for his family.

loans.use: purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Elmir

texts.en: Elmir is married with two children. One child is four years old and the other is two years old. Elmir is 29 years old and lives with his family in Baku region. However, they have been IDP (Internally Displaced Persons) from their motherland, Fuzuli city, for 21 years. Elmir's wife is a housewife. Elmir wants to provide a better future for his children, therefore he wants to increase his business and monthly income. Elmir rents a salon and for five years, he has been in the barber shop business. Today, he needs a loan in the amount of 2,000 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat). With this loan, Elmir wants to repair the salon's water system. He says he is thankful to the Kiva organization and lenders for the aid. In the future, Elmir wants to buy this salon and increase his monthly income.

loans.use: to repair the salon's water system.

loans.name: Resureccion

texts.en:
Resureccion, 64  years old, is married and has 7 children. She lives in Macabayao, Jimenez, Philippines. For the past 2 years, Resureccion has operated a business selling a variety of goods, earning PHP 3,000 monthly. She has requested a loan of PHP 14,900 to restock her store with basic commodities.
Resureccion has been a member of PMPC for 10 years.  In the future, she hopes to save for expenditures.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities

loans.name: Andres

texts.es: Andrés de 31 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su esposa y sus hijos de 7 años y 5 meses de edad. Andrés  se dedica a hacer trabajos de albañilería de forma ambulante. De esta forma se gana la vida y mantiene  la economía del hogar. Habita en condiciones muy humildes y desea mejorarlas poco a poco. Desea reparar el techo de la vivienda ya que actualmente se encuentra deteriorado. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de madera y lámina para proceder al cambio del techo lo antes posible.
texts.en: Andres is 31 years old and lives in a home of his own with his wife and children, ages 7 and 5 months.  Andres works as a mason on foot and earns a living and supports his household this way.  He lives under humble conditions and is improving them little by little.  He wants to repair his roof which is currently deteriorating, so he is asking for a loan buy lumber and metal to begin the work as soon as possible.

loans.use: to repair his roof.

loans.name: Arsen

texts.en:
Arsen is 30 years old. He lives in Ijevan in Tavush region. Arsen is married and he has a son. With his small family, he lives with his parents. Arsen is a very active, laborious young man, who works at the police station and studies at the Ijevan distance learning branch of the State Armenian University, in the Department of Psychology and Pedagogy. 

Arsen took his first loan from Kiva in order to pay for his education. Now, simultaneously with his work, Arsen runs his own business: he sells a great variety of fruits and vegetables right from his car around his city. He buys some of the fruits and vegetables from the villagers and also drives to Georgia and brings some fruits and vegetables from there. 

Arsen again needs Kiva lenders’ financial help. He asks for a loan of 1,100,000 Armenian drams, in order to expand the assortment of fruits and vegetables for sale, and also to buy new winter tires for his car.

loans.use: to expand the assortment of fruits and vegetables for sale, and also to buy new winter tires for his car.

loans.name: Xalida

texts.en:
Xalida is a druggist. She is 54 years old, married for 32 years, with four children. Xalida’s family are IDP (Internally Displaced Persons) from Füzuli city, and now they live in Baku region. Two of Xalida's children are married and the other two children live with Xalida. One child attends 11 class and the other goes to 9 class. 

As noted, Xalida is a druggist, and she has been in this business for 12 years. She needs 1,700 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat) to improve her business and increase her monthly income. With this loan, she wants to buy more medicine. Xalida says thank you to Kiva for the loan. In the future, she wants to open a big drugstore.

loans.use: to buy more medicine.

loans.name: Rita

texts.en: Rita, 55 years old, is married and has 4 children. She lives in Macabayao, Jimenez, Philippines. Rita is a farmer who has been raising pigs for 3 years. She has requested a loan to buy feed. Rita has been a member of PMPC for 4 years. In the future, she hopes to save for emergencies.

loans.use: to buy feed

loans.name: Maria

texts.en: Maria is a hardworking woman who has managed to support her family out of the profit she gets from her business. The previous loan helped her to buy foodstuffs for her grocery. Maria comes to you again requesting a loan of KES 30,000 to buy tomatoes, onions and fish to sell since she started another business selling fish to supplement her income.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, onions and fish to sell

loans.name: Karen Lorena

texts.es:
Karen Lorena es una persona a la cual le apasionan todos los temas relacionados con la salud,le gusta mucho la administración en salud ya que cree que es un campo interesante y en el cual se necesita mucho orden y concentración, para así poder ser un miembro productivo dentro del  área de trabajo y el cual le sirve como complemento para el anterior estudio.
Las metas que tiene, son aplicar todos los conocimientos que aprenda y le brinden en el instituto para dar una buena atención a las personas y darles toda la ayuda que necesiten; también desea poner todo el empeño para lograr ser la mejor en lo que hace, ya que cree que la mejor satisfacción que puede tener una persona es ayudar a los demás sin esperar nada a cambio. 
Ella se considera una persona honesta, puntual, responsable, amable, dinámica, respetuosa, con muchos valores y cualidades.
Los propósitos que ella tiene desde el primer momento en el que ingrese a la formación,es adquirir todos los conocimientos que le brinden los docentes e investigar las cosas más a fondo para poder ser la mejor estudiante y así poder llegar al campo de practica bien preparada para brindarle a todas las personas una excelente atención; también le gustaría que dentro del campo de practica las personas que ya trabajan allí le enseñen cosas nuevas y diferentes. 
Ella quiere estar capacitada para poder brindar atención en diferentes áreas de la salud como son en hospitales de alta y baja complejidad, eps, en sectores públicos y privados.
Por última meta es lograr una provechosa práctica, que sea productiva y que este bien preparada para poder desempeñar bien el papel laboral y tenga un buen desempeño y la pudieran dejar trabajando en la empresa que se encuentre.
El convenio con kiva seria de gran ayuda ya que las cuotas le quedarían mas económicas y podría solventar otros gastos que tiene.
texts.en:
Karen Lorena is a person who is passionate about everything to do with health.  She really likes healthcare administration because she thinks it's an interesting field which requires a lot of organization and concentration, and will allow her to be a productive member of the field.  It also complements her studies.  
Her goals are to apply all the information she learns, and that the institute provides, so she can assist people well and give them all the help they need.  She also wants to work hard to be the best at what she does since she thinks the most satisfaction a person can get comes from helping others without expecting anything in return.  
She considers herself honest, punctual, responsible, nice, outgoing, and respectful, with lots of good principles and qualities.  From the moment she starts the program she plans to acquire all the knowledge the teachers offer and investigate things in depth so she can be the best student.  This way she can enter the field able to provide a good service for all the people.  She would also like for people already working in the field to teach her new and different things.  
Karen Lorena wants to be trained to work in different areas of health such as multi-specialty and single-specialty hospitals, government sponsored healthcare providers, and the public and private sectors.  Her last goal is to have an advantageous, productive internship so she can be well trained to fill her position, perform well, and be able to continue working for the company.  The agreement with Kiva will be very helpful because the payments are more affordable and she will be able to pay off other expenses that she has.

loans.use: to pay tuition for one semester

loans.name: Vrezh

texts.en:
Vrezh lives in Kapan town in Syuniq region. He is a taxi driver with many years of working experience. Vrezh is married and has a five-year old son. He works day and night to be able to sustain his family's living.  Because of difficult financial conditions, Vrezh isn't able to repair his car, which is damaged. He asks for this loan to be able to pay for repairs to the car and to purchase new tires. It is very important for Vrezh to bring the car to working condition and continue taxi driving. 

Vrezh has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. 

The loan is very important for Vrezh and he hopes for lenders' goodwill.

loans.use: to pay for repairs to his car and to purchase new tires.

loans.name: Digna

texts.es:
Digna es una mujer trabajadora y activa, a sus 44 años de edad, se dedica a atender su propio negocio; una tienda de abarrotes que ubicó en un espacio de su casa, allí ofrece diversos productos de la canasta familiar y, de manera alterna, también realiza labores como empleada doméstica en diferentes casas, por días, así logra complementar los ingresos para solventar los gastos de su familia.
El crédito lo utilizará para realizar adecuaciones locativas (revocar y pintar las paredes, cambiar la baldosa del piso); esto permitirá dar una mejor imagen al negocio y podrá cambiar la percepción de los visitantes, logrando incrementar el flujo de visitantes y mejorar las ventas.
Digna manifiesta que su propósito para un futuro cercano es poder independizarse totalmente y dedicarse de lleno al manejo de su negocio y a disfrutar más tiempo con sus hijos, quienes son el motor que la impulsa a luchar día a día; además quiere seguir fortaleciendo su negocio para que les garantice una estabilidad económica favorable y poder disfrutar una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Digna is an active, hardworking woman of 44 years.  She has her own business, a grocery store situated in part of her house where she sells a variety of basic pantry products.  Some days she also does housework in different homes to supplement her income and meet family expenses.

She'll use the loan she's seeking to do home improvements (plaster and paint the walls and change floor tiles).  This will allow her to put a better face on her business, change visitors' perceptions, increase customer flow, and improve sales. 

Digna says that her near-term plan is to become completely independent and fully dedicate herself to managing the business.  She also wants to enjoy more time with her children who are her motivation for fighting day after day.  In addition, she wants to keep strengthening the business to ensure herself stable finances and the ability to enjoy a better quality of life.

loans.use: to do home improvements (plaster and paint the walls, change the floor tiles).

loans.name: Davit

texts.en:
Davit, 26 years old, is married and has 3 children. He lives in Nigozeti, in the Chiatura district. The family's only source of income is from agricultural activities. Davit has been busy cultivating land, where he grows maize and haricots. His wife helps him to manage the business; however, it is hardly enough to provide food for the 5 members of his family. 

Davit wants to develop his business but he has no money to buy products for trading. He applied for credit but the local credit providers usually demand experience and some stable income from the borrowers. His credit requests were rejected several times, as he doesn’t satisfy the requirements. Davit received credit in the framework of a joint initiative of Kiva and Credo, called Startup Program, that gives rural poor people the chance to start or re-start businesses. Davit will use this loan of 800 GEL to purchase citrus and sell it at the local market. This loan will help him to increase his income and the profits will help improve the family's living conditions. Davit awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase citrus to sell at the market

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es:
Ricardo se dedica a brindar servicios de fotocopias. Él vive con sus hijos pues su esposa esta de viaje.

El vive en casa propia, ubicada en la ciudad de El Alto en la zona Villa Ingenio. 

El sueño de Ricardo es tener en un mediano plazo equipos y máquinas diseñadas para desarrollar altas velocidades y al mismo tiempo, obtener máxima eficiencia en los diferentes procesos de fotocopiadoras, lo que redunda en mayores volúmenes de fotocopias, reducción en costos y mejora de la calidad de los producto. Asi brindar mejor servicio y calidad de vida a su familia. Ricardo necesita el crédito para abrir una tienda donde pueda atender más cómodamente a sus clientes con sus dos máquinas fotocopiadoras. Actualmente atiende en su casa, pero no está muy bien ubicada y pierde clientela.

Es la segunda vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Ricardo makes a living by providing photocopying services. He lives with his children, but his wife is traveling. He lives in his own home, located in the city of El Alto in the Villa Ingenio zone. 

Ricardo's dream is to have equipment and machines designed to function at high speeds and, at the same time, provide maximum efficiency in the different photocopying processes. This would result in a higher volume of photocopies, a reduction in costs, and an improvement in the quality of the products. This way, he can provide better services and give his family a better quality of life.

Ricardo needs the loan to open a store where he can more comfortably accommodate his clients with his two photocopying machines. He currently works out of his home, but it is not very conveniently located and he loses a lot of clients.

This is his second loan with IMPRO and his first with KIVA.

loans.use: to pay for costs related to opening a store offering photocopying services.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es:
Pablo y su esposa se dedican a la elaboración de queso, el cual vende en distintas ferias de la población de Achacachi; vive en casa propia, tiene cinco hijos, dos de sus hijos trabajan en la ciudad de  La Paz, y los otros tres se encuentran en etapa escolar en la comunidad Cala Cala  del municipio de Achacachi, a dos   horas y  media de viaje de la ciudad de La Paz, cuenta con  pocas cabezas de ganado  las cuales le proporcionan leche para su producción de queso.
El credito requiere para compra de una vaca lechera y asi, incrementara su produccion, y sus ingresos.

El sueño de Pablo es incrementar sus cabezas de ganado, aumentando la producción  de leche en su comunidad.

Es la segunda vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA. La foto que se adjunta inclouye a su esposa.
texts.en:
Pablo and his spouse work making cheese, which they sell at different markets in the town of Achacachi. Pablo lives in his own home and has five children. Two of his children work in the city of La Paz. The other three are in school in the community of Cala Cala, in the municipality of Achacachi, which is a two and a half hour journey away from the city of La Paz.

Pablo has a few cattle, which provide him with milk for his cheese production. He needs this loan in order to buy a dairy cow, which will let him increase his production and his earnings.

Pablo's dream is to acquire more cattle, increasing the production of milk in his community. This is the second time he has requested a loan from IMPRO and his first loan with Kiva. The photo attached also includes his wife.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow to increase his milk production, in order to produce more cheese to sell.

loans.name: Virak

texts.en:
Virak is 28 years old and a resident of Samraong Tong district, Kampong Speu province. He is married with two school-going children. Virak owns and operates a repair shop in this region to earn a living. He has been serving the village for many years, providing repairs and vehicle maintenance and he earns well for the family. He is happy and thankful because his wife helps him earn enough income to meet their daily needs.

To improve his services, he is taking out a loan in the sum of USD 1,500 to buy motor spare parts and vehicle fuel to be used for repair and maintenance services. In the future, Virak wants to save money to expand his business and improve the general living situation of his family.

loans.use: to buy motor spare parts and vehicle fuel to be used for repair and maintenance services.

loans.name: Susana

texts.en:
Susana is 52 years old and lives in Dumagoc Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur. She is married with 3 children.

Susana has a store that sells fish and she earns approximately PHP 12,000.00 each month doing this type of business. She requested a loan to buy more fish to sell.

Susana has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, she hopes to save more so she can build a house from her income.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is 45 years old and lives in Dumagoc Pagadian City, Zamboanga del Sur. She is married with 4 children.

Nenita has a store that sells goods and dry goods and she earns approximately PHP 8,000.00 each month doing this type of business. She requested a loan to buy more goods and dry goods to sell.

Nenita has been a member of PMPC for 5 years. In the future, she hopes to build a bigger store.

loans.use: to buy more goods and dry goods to sell

loans.name: Virgilita

texts.en:
Virgilita  is 49 years old, married and a resident of Oroquieta City, Philippines. She earns a living through her rice retail business for a number of years.
She is a member of PMPC for 2 years and enjoys the privileges being a member of the Cooperative. Now, she is applying a loan of Php 7,000 to buy rice stocks to answer the demand of her customers.

 Virgilita deeply wishes to maintain a member in good standing with PMPC.

loans.use: To buy stocks for rice wholesale

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard, 43 years of age, manages a farming business. He is glad because, through his farming, he has been able to sustain his family's basic necessities. For continuous crop production growth, Richard is requesting a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy seeds, fertilizers and insecticides. He is hoping that lenders will grant his requested loan for him to give his family a comfortable lifestyle and improve his financial status.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and insecticides for his farming business

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en:
Angelina is thankful for the financial assistance extended to her. She was able to buy more products for her business. Her loan also helped in the education of her children, while her income from business is assisting their everyday household expenditures. She and her husband are working hard to provide for their everyday needs.
 
She would like to apply for another 20,000 PHP loan for her to purchase products, like dish washing liquid, fabric conditioner, detergent powder, and other products for her business. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs and educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this financial increase with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Angelina dreams to have her own stall and hopes to have a better living. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her life and business and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and from the Word of God she studies.

* All Center for Community Transformation Credit Cooperative (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for products, like dishwashing liquid, fabric conditioner, detergent powder, and other products for her business.

loans.name: Chizi

texts.en:
Chizi is a widow who has seven children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest  monthly expenses are food and school fees for her children.

Chizi has operated a vegetable stall business, selling from home to her neighbors and passersby. She faces stiff competition from other vegetable operators in her business. Chizi will use this KES 30,000 loan to purchase sacks of tomatoes, potatoes, fruits and green vegetables for resale.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of tomatoes, potatoes, fruits and green vegetables for resale.

loans.name: Seymur

texts.en:
Seymur is 26 years old. He is single and lives with his mother and father in Baku region. His parents are elderly and Seymur takes care of them. Also, his father lost the ability to work, periodically taking medication. Seymur’s mother keeps some poultry in the yard for themselves.

Seymur is a taxi driver. He transports passengers between Baku and Fuzuli regions. Today he has applied for a loan in the amount of 1,800 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat) to buy new wheels for his taxi. Of course, after repairs, his monthly income will be better, and he will get married to his fiancee. Seymur is thankful to Kiva and lenders for the help. 

In the future, he wants to have a lovely family with three children and tidy house.

loans.use: to buy new wheels for his taxi.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
ROBERTO se dedica a la producción de quesos, vive con sus  dos hijos los cuales  se encuentran en edad escolar en el colegio de la misma comunidad, los quesos que Ellos elaboran los vende directamente el publico en días de feria en la población de Achacachi, considerada ya una ciudad intermedia.

Actualmente vive en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de Churuhuata Belen  del municipio de Achacachi a dos   horas y media de viaje de la ciudad de La Paz, cuenta con  algunas cabezas de ganado  las cuales le proporcionan leche, con la que elabora su producción de quesos.
.
El crédito  requiere para comprar una vaca lechera y así incrementar su producción de leche y por consiguiente elaborar más quesos.

El sueño de Roberto es incrementar sus cabezas de ganado.

Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA. La foto que se incluye fue tomada y su hija aparece en la misma acompañando a Roberto.
texts.en:
Roberto makes a living by making cheese. He lives with his two children, who are school-aged and attend school in their community. They sell the cheese that they make directly to the public on market days in Achacachi, which is a medium-sized city.

He currently lives in his own home in the community of Churuhuata Belen, in the municipality of Achacachi, which is about two and a half hours from the city of La Paz. He has some heads of cattle that provide milk, which he uses to make cheese.

He requests the loan to purchase a dairy cow to increase milk production so that he can make more cheese.

Roberto's dream is to have more heads of cattle. This is his first loan with IMPRO and KIVA. The photograph above includes Roberto and his daughter.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow to increase milk production so that he can produce more cheese, which his his main business.

loans.name: Orlando

texts.es:
Orlando  es un joven, hijo mayor de la familia; el es soltero, tuvo que dejar los estudios y dedicarse a la producción de leche junto a su familia; viven en la comunidad de Tipampa de la población de Achacachi ubicada a dos horas y media de distancia de la ciudad de La Paz considerada ya una ciudad intermedia.
Orlando posee unas cuantas vacas que son de su propiedad y que se encuentran actualmente tres en producción de leche, la cual vende a una de las Plantas Industrializadoras de Leche del departamento de La Paz.

Con el crédito  Orlando  adquirirá una vaca más y así incrementar poco a poco su producción de leche y a futuro su sueño es tener su propio hato de ganado  con mayor producción y así poder ser independiente económicamente

Es la segunda  vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Orlando is a young man and is the oldest child in his family. He is single. He had to leave school to work in the dairy industry with his family. He lives in the Tipampa community in Achacachi, which is located about two and a half hours from the city of La Paz, a medium-sized city.

Orlando has a few cattle that are his own and he currently has three that produce milk. He sells the milk in one of the Industrial Milk Plants in La Paz.

With this loan, Orlando will purchase another cow so that he can increase his milk production little by little. In the future, his dream is to have his own herd of cattle with a greater production capacity so that he can be financially independent.

This is the second time that he has requested a loan through IMPRO and his first with KIVA.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow to increase milk production and profits.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.es:
Alberto  vive junto a su esposa y sus hijos en su casita propia; ellos se dedican a la producción de leche la cual entregan a una de las Plantas Industrializadoras de Leche del departamento de La Paz; además para mejorar sus ingresos económicos realiza trabajos de albañilería en la población de Achacachi, todos sus hijos se encuentran en edad escolar en el colegio de la misma población, su casa esta ubicada en la comunidad de Chahuira Pampa de la población de Achacachi ubicada a dos horas y media de distancia de la ciudad de La Paz considerada ya una ciudad intermedia.
 El posee unas cuantas vacas  lecheras de las cuales  se encuentran actualmente dos en producción de leche,

Con el crédito  Alberto  adquirirá una vaca más y así incrementar poco a poco su producción y a futuro su sueño es tener una mayor cantidad de ganado y asi poder superarse económicamente mejorando su calidad de vida de su familia.

Es la segunda vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Alberto lives with his wife and children in his own home. They work producing milk which they deliver to one of the milk processing plants in the department of La Paz. Alberto also works in masonry to earn more money in the town of Achacachi. All his children attend school in the same locality. His house is located in the community of Chahuira Pampa in the town of Achacachi located some two hours and a half from the city of La Paz, and it is considered a medium size city.

He has a few dairy cows of which two are currently producing milk. Alberto will use the loan to buy another cow, increasing production little by little, and his dream for the future is to have a greater number of cattle so he can prosper financially improving the quality of life for his family. 

This is the second time he has applied for a loan through IMPRO and the first time with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow to increase milk production to improve the family income

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan Carlos es chofer propietario; trabaja en uno de los  sindicatos de choferes  de la población de Achacachi; vive en casa de su madre junto con su esposa y su pequeño hijo en la zona nueva esperanza del municipio de Achacachi, a dos   horas de viaje de la ciudad de La Paz.
El crédito requiere para compra de motor y mantenimiento en general de su movilidad.

El sueño de Juan Carlos es tener su movilidad en buen estado, asi podra incrementar mas sus ingresos para su familia.

Es la primera vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is an owner/driver who works for one of the drivers' organizations in the town of Achacachi.  He lives in his mother's house along with his wife and young son in the Nueva Esperanza area of Achacachi, about two hours from the town of La Paz.

He needs a loan to buy a motor and for general maintenance of his vehicle. Juan Carlos's hope is to keep his vehicle well-maintained so that he can earn more money for his family. This is the first time he's asked for a loan from IMPRO and also the first time from Kiva.

loans.use: buy a motor and for general maintenance of his passenger vehicle

loans.name: Raquel

texts.es:
Raquel es una mujer muy trabajadora, que por medio de la decoración de eventos esta tratando de poder ir mejorando su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
Este es su segundo crédito con kiva, y comenta que el anterior lo uso para la compra de materiales para poder cumplir con un pedido de centro de mesas que tenia, y así no quedar mal con sus clientes.
Pide nuevamente de un crédito para poder comprar telas, y así poder usarlas en las decoraciones de eventos que hace. Comenta que sueña con agrandar el negocio y dar fuente de trabajo  a las personas.
texts.en:
Raquel is a very hardworking woman. Through event decoration she is trying to be able to improve her and her family's quality of life. 

This is her second loan with Kiva and she says and she says that the previous one was used to fill an order for center pieces that she had and not look bad to her customers. 

She is asking for a loan again to be able to buy fabrics and use them for event decorations that she makes. She says that she dreams of enlarging her business and becoming a source of employment for people.

loans.use: to buy fabrics for decoration.

loans.name: Ainiza

texts.ru: Айнизе 33 года, замужем, вместе с супругом воспитывают 2 детей. Старшему сыну 8 лет, младшему 4 года, супруг помогает по хозяйству, а Айниза -домохозяйка, занимается домашним хозяйством и воспитанием детей. Супруг по сезонно работает в доме отдыха, имеет определенные сезонные доходы. У Айнизы - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи Айниза занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 14 лет назад, с покупки скота на 10,000 сом KGS. Благодаря упорному труду Айнизы, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется: 1 дойная корова, 1 бычок, также обрабатывает 1,20 ГА земли, где в основном выращивает -картофель, сеет зерновые культуры, эспарцет для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Полученный урожай реализуют оптовым поставщикам. Айниза вместе с супругом проводит своевременную вакцинацию для профилактики против болезней скота. Ежемесячный доход составляет 10,000 сом (KGS) от реализации молока, от полеводства и от частичной зарплаты супруга. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Айниза обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом - на покупку овец для увеличения поголовья скота. Доходы от кредита Айниза планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, и планирует накопить средства на дальнейшее обучение детей.
texts.en: Ainiza is 33 years old, married and raising 2 children together with her husband. Her oldest son is 8 years old and the youngest is 4. Her husband helps with the business, and Ainiza is a homemaker, involved in domestic household and raising the children.  Her husband works seasonally at a vacation resort and has a set seasonal income.  Ainiza has a secondary education. To provide the primary income for her family, she is involved in animal husbandry and farming, having started 14 years ago with a purchase of livestock with 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Ainiza's hard work, today her business contains 1 dairy cow, 1 bull and a 1.2 hectare land plot, where she primarily grows potatoes, plants cereal crops and sainfoin for household consumption and sale. They sell the resulting harvest to wholesale distributors.  Ainiza and her husband are proactive about vaccinating livestock to prevent diseases.  The monthly income amounts to 10,000 som (KGS) from sales of milk, farming and her husband's partial salary. In order to further develop her business, Ainiza requested a loan from the microfinance bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" to buy sheep in order to increase livestock headcount. Ainiza plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further increasing domestic livestock quantities and saving money for her children's continued education.

loans.use: to buy sheep in order to increase livestock headcount

loans.name: Lucy

texts.en:
Lucy is 34 years old from Nakuru and a very determined businesswoman. She is blessed with two children ages 14 and 10 years.

She operates a salon and she has been in the business for 10 years. She earns a monthly income of KES. 10,000. Currently, she has applied for her second loan of 15,000 KES from VisionFund Kenya. She plans to use her loan to expand her hair dressing business.

She plans to use the gains from her business to pay her loan, educate her children as well as boost her business. In future she hopes to buy a plot and build houses for rent.

loans.use: to buy salon equipment e.g., a blow dryer and hair chemicals

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph, 41 years old, is a very hardworking man from Nakuru. He is married to Patricia and they are blessed with two children, aged 5 and 11 years.

For the past 4 years, Joseph has owned and operated a film shop, earning a monthly income of KES 10,000. He has applied for his first loan of KES 25,000 from VisionFund Kenya to expand his film business. Joseph plans to use his monthly income to repay his loan, educate his children and expand his business. In the future, he hopes to expand his business in other towns.

loans.use: To expand his filming business by buying more cameras.

loans.name: Damaris

texts.en:
For the past 2 years, Damaris has operated a soft drinks and snacks shop in Nairobi and it has been profitable. She is 27 years old and single. Right now her monthly income is KES 30,000 and she is able to support her family members with it.

Damaris plans to use this loan to buy more stock of snacks such as cakes, various types of fruit juice and soft drinks. She will save some of the anticipated profit and use part of it to repay the loan. This is Damaris' first loan from VisionFund Kenya. In the future, she hopes to be a successful entrepreneur and to buy a piece of land.

loans.use: To buy more stock of soft drinks, juice and cakes.

loans.name: Ximena Dolores

texts.es:
La señora Ximena, tiene 33 años, es soltera, tiene dos  hijos de 15 y 16 años estudiantes, vive en Puyo-Putuimi, dicha  zona es cálida- húmeda, es un sector con  variedad de vegetación, se dedica a la producción y venta de caña de azúcar (fruta) dicha actividad la realiza sola, el sueño de la señora fue ser profesora pero tuvo a tempana edad sus hijos y tuvo que dedicarse a trabajar para sacar adelante a sus niños, sus padres le enseñaron el cultivo la caña, el propósito que tiene es mejorar su plantación para ofrecer a sus clientes producto de mejor calidad y tener mayor productividad para tener mejores ingresos. Ximena solicita el crédito para la compra de materia prima con el fin de mejorar su plantación y producir productos de calidad.
Ximena agradece a Fundación Alternativa y a Kiva por el apoyo recibido ya que gracias a estos fondos podrá cumplir sus metas a futuro.
texts.en:
Ximena is 33 years old and single. She has two children, who are 15 and 16 years old and go to school. She lives in Puyo-Putuimi. This area is hot and humid, and it has a variety of vegetation. Ximena works producing and selling sugar cane (fruit). She carries out this work on her own. Ximena's dream was to be a teacher, but she had her children at an early age and had to dedicate herself to her work in order to help her children to get ahead.

Ximena's parents taught her how to cultivate sugar cane. Her aim is to improve her plantation in order to provide her customers with a better-quality product and increase her productivity in order to have greater earnings. Ximena is requesting this loan to purchase raw materials, with the goal of improving her plantation and producing a quality product. Ximena is thankful to Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for the support she has received, since she will be able to reach her goals in the future thanks to these funds.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for planting sugar cane and improve her products.

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
Este comité se encuentra, en su primer ciclo es un comité responsable. Podemos hablar de la Sra. Silvina que es una señora muy dedicada a su comité y a su comunidad, ella es muy activa y sacrificada, y comenta que tiene como meta esforzarse al máximo para darle a su familia todo lo que ella no pudo tener.
Entre el trabajo que ella hace, comenta que se dedica al reciclaje de todo tipo de producto, los cuales compra y luego revende para poder tener un poco de ganancia. Está orgullosa de lo que hace, ya que es un trabajo honesto con el que ayuda a su familia.
Pide este préstamo para usarlo en la compra de materiales reciclados que le ofrecen, los cuales revenderá y así tendrá un margen de ganancias.
texts.en:
This group is in its first loan cycle. It is a responsible group. We can speak of Silvina who is a  woman very devoted to her group and to her community. She is very energetic and self-sacrificing and says that her goal is to do her utmost to give her her family everything she couldn't have. 

One of the jobs she does is recycling all kinds of products, which she buys and then resells so that she can have a bit of profit. She is proud of what she does, as it is honest work with which she helps her family. She is asking for this loan to use to purchase recycled materials that are offered to her, which she will resell and have a profit margin.

loans.use: To buy recycled materials for resale.

loans.name: Isidro

texts.es:
El señor Isidro, es de la Ciudad de Santaní, tiene casa propia, es casado, con hijos, se dedica a la venta de verduras y su señora cría animales de corral, y de esa forma esta pareja lucha por su familia e hijos.
Es un señor muy trabajador, responsable y muy honesto, empezó a trabajar en una verdulería como vendedor, trabajo casi 4 años después salió de ahí para trabajar de forma independiente, empezó a vender sus productos en una motocicleta, y ahora reparte su producto en un motocarro, cuenta con clientela bien formada que siempre compra de él sus productos.
solicita este crédito para comprar más verduras para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Isidro is from the city of Santaní.  He's married with children and has his own house.  He and his wife fight hard for their family and children: he sells vegetables and his wife raises farmyard animals.  

Isidro is a very honest, reliable, and hardworking man.  He started out working as a vendor in a produce shop.  He worked for four years and then left to work on his  own.  He started selling his products from his motor bike and now delivers them by three-wheeled van.  He has a well-established clientele that always buy their products from him.  

Isidro is seeking a loan to buy more vegetables to meet his clients' needs.

loans.use: to buy a variety of vegetables to sell.
